original: @1b #// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: @1b #// shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: Mahāvaipulya Sūtra

original: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba /
translated: Called the “Great Heap of Jewels”

original: bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
translated: Twentieth

original: de nas lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the god Smṛtilābha said to the bodhisattva Dharmeśvararāja:

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung @2a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i gsung rab la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung @2a *//
translated: In all world systems, the bodhisattvas who have gone forth from home to homelessness in the noble teachings

original: zhing ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba de dag gis tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa 'di dag las 'das te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba
analyzed: zhing ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba de dag gis tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa 'di dag las 'das te myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba
translated: and wear saffron robes, by what pure conduct of Brahmā can they surpass these bodhisattva stages and quickly attain unsurpassed perfect awakening?

original: de ji ltar yid la bya /
analyzed: de ji ltar yid la bya /
translated: How should they keep it in mind?”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang; byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang; byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis lha'i bu dran pa dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: The bodhisattva Dharmamati said to the god Smṛtilekhā:🔽“Son of the gods, it is excellent, excellent that you have asked this question.🔽

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: The bodhisattva Dharma­mati said to the devaputra Smrti, “O son of the victors!

original: de bas na; byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs pa bcu rnam par @2b bsgoms te gong du chos bcu yid la bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na; byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis dmigs pa bcu rnam par @2b bsgoms te gong du chos bcu yid la bya'o //
translated: Therefore, those who have correctly entered the vehicle of the bodhisattvas should meditate on the ten objects and keep the ten dharmas in mind.

original: dmigs pa bcu rnam par bsgoms pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa bcu rnam par bsgoms pa gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten objects of meditation?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: lus dang lus kyi las dang / ngag dang ngag kyi las dang / yid dang yid kyi las dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa yang dag par blang ba dag ste /🔽ci / tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus sam /
analyzed: lus dang lus kyi las dang / ngag dang ngag kyi las dang / yid dang yid kyi las dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa yang dag par blang ba dag ste / ci / tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus sam /
translated: the body and the actions of the body, speech and the actions of speech, mind and the actions of mind, the Buddha, the Dharma, the Saṅgha, and the precepts.🔽Is the practice of celibacy the body?

original: de ste tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus yin na ni /🔽tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi gtsang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ste tshangs pa'i spyod pa de lus yin na ni / tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi gtsang bar 'gyur /
translated: If the practice of celibacy were the body,🔽the practice of celibacy would be impure.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa chos ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa chos ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: The practice of celibacy would be non-Dharma.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'khrugs par 'gyur /🔽tshangs pa'i spyod pa dri nga bar 'gyur /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'khrugs par 'gyur / tshangs pa'i spyod pa dri nga bar 'gyur /
translated: The pure conduct will be disturbed.🔽The pure conduct will be stinking.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa gtsang ba ma yin par 'gyur /🔽tshangs pa'i spyod pa smad par 'gyur /🔽tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi mthun par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa gtsang ba ma yin par 'gyur / tshangs pa'i spyod pa smad par 'gyur / tshangs pa'i spyod pa mi mthun par 'gyur /
translated: The pure conduct will be impure.🔽The pure conduct will be despised.🔽The pure conduct will be incompatible.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur /🔽tshangs pa'i spyod pa keng rus su 'gyur /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur / tshangs pa'i spyod pa keng rus su 'gyur /
translated: The pure conduct will be defiled.🔽The pure conduct will be like a skeleton.

original: tshangs pa'i spyod pa srin gyi tshang du 'gyur ro //🔽de ste lus kyi @3a *//
analyzed: tshangs pa'i spyod pa srin gyi tshang du 'gyur ro // de ste lus kyi @3a *//
translated: The pure conduct will be like a spider’s web.

original: las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
translated: If the physical action is pure conduct,

original: nyal ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽'dug pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: nyal ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / 'dug pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: then sleeping will be pure conduct.🔽Sitting will be pure conduct.

original: 'greng ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'greng ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Standing will be pure conduct.

original: 'gro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Going will be pure conduct.🔽Looking will be pure conduct.

original: rnam par bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par bltas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Looking around will be pure conduct.

original: bskum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: bskum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Bending will be pure conduct.

original: brkyang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽'khor ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: brkyang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / 'khor ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Stretching is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Saṃsāra is the practice of Brahmā.

original: 'gres pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽de ste ngag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /🔽dbyangs tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gres pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro // de ste ngag tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni / dbyangs tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: The aggregates are the practice of Brahmā.🔽If speech is the practice of Brahmā,🔽then melody is the practice of Brahmā.

original: nga ro tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod bar 'gyur /🔽smra ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: nga ro tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod bar 'gyur / smra ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Sound is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Expression is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Speech is the practice of Brahmā.

original: smros pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur; thong gnas rtsol ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽lce bsgyur ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: smros pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur; thong gnas rtsol ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / lce bsgyur ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Words are the practice of Brahmā.🔽The tongue is the practice of Brahmā.

original: mchu sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: mchu sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: The lips are the practice of Brahmā.

original: @3b tshig sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //🔽de ste ngag gi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni //
analyzed: @3b tshig sbyar ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro // de ste ngag gi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni //
translated: The joining of words is the practice of Brahmā.🔽If verbal action is the practice of Brahmā,

original: brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: then expression is the practice of Brahmā.

original: brdar byas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: brdar byas pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: The use of signs is the practice of Brahmā.

original: shin tu bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽bstan pas rnam par bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: shin tu bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / bstan pas rnam par bstan pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Teaching is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Explaining is the practice of Brahmā.

original: legs par brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: legs par brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Good speech is the practice of Brahmā.

original: ngan du brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽rnam par gdags pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽rnam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: ngan du brjod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / rnam par gdags pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / rnam par spyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Bad speech is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Designation is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Conduct is the practice of Brahmā.

original: yongs su smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su smos pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Mention is the practice of Brahmā.

original: de ste yid tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /🔽dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ste yid tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni / dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: If the mind is the practice of Brahmā,🔽investigation is the practice of Brahmā.

original: rnam par dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Analysis is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Conception is the practice of Brahmā.

original: rnam par rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽phyir dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / phyir dran pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Discernment is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Recollection is the practice of Brahmā.🔽Remembrance is the practice of Brahmā.

original: sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Thought is the practice of Brahmā.

original: rnam par sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽sgyu ma tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par sems pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / sgyu ma tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: The thought of the mind is pure conduct.🔽Illusion is pure conduct.

original: rmi lam tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rmi lam tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Dreams are pure conduct.

original: de ste yid kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de ste yid kyi las tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
translated: If the activity of the mind is pure conduct,

original: 'du shes tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du shes tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: perception is pure conduct.

original: yid la byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽grang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: yid la byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / grang ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Mental activity is pure conduct.🔽Cold is pure conduct.

original: dro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽bde ba tshangs pa'i spyod par @4a *//
analyzed: dro ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / bde ba tshangs pa'i spyod par @4a *//
translated: Warmth is pure conduct.🔽Happiness is pure conduct.

original: 'gyur; sdug bsngal tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽bkres pa changs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gyur; sdug bsngal tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / bkres pa changs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Suffering is pure conduct.🔽Hunger is pure conduct.

original: skom pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /🔽dga' ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: skom pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur / dga' ba tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Thirst is pure conduct.🔽Joy is pure conduct.

original: zhum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhum pa tshangs pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Depression is pure conduct.

original: de ste sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de ste sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
translated: If the Buddha is pure conduct,

original: gzugs sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: gzugs sangs rgyas sam /
translated: is form the Buddha,

original: 'on tam tshor ba sangs rgyas sam; 'du shes sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: 'on tam tshor ba sangs rgyas sam; 'du shes sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Is perception the Buddha?

original: 'du byed sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: 'du byed sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Are volitional factors the Buddha?

original: rnam par shes pa sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Is consciousness the Buddha?

original: mtshan rnams sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: mtshan rnams sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Are the marks the Buddha?

original: mngon par shes pa sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Are the superknowledges the Buddha?

original: las sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: las sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Is karma the Buddha?

original: 'on te rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas sam /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas sam /
translated: Is ripening the Buddha?

original: de ste legs par bshad pa'i chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni /
analyzed: de ste legs par bshad pa'i chos nyid tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas yin na ni /
translated: If the reality of the well-taught Dharma is the abode of pure conduct,

original: 'gog pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gog pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: cessation would be the abode.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Nirvāṇa would be the abode.

original: bral ba gnas su 'gyur ro //🔽ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bral ba gnas su 'gyur ro // ma skyes pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Freedom would be the abode.🔽Non-arising would be the abode.

original: ma byung ba gnas su 'gyur ro //🔽grags pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byung ba gnas su 'gyur ro // grags pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Non-occurrence would be the abode.🔽Non-fame would be the abode.

original: rtog pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Non-conception would be the abode.

original: rgyu ba med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu ba med pa gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: Non-movement would be the abode.

original: phrad pa med pa'i gnas ni /
analyzed: phrad pa med pa'i gnas ni /
translated: The abode of non-contact

original: tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: would be the abode of Brahmā.

original: de ste dge 'dun sdom pa'i nan tan can tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: de ste dge 'dun sdom pa'i nan tan can tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
translated: If it is the earnest practice of the monastic community that is the pure life,🔽then it is the monastic community for the sake of the fruit of stream-enterer,

original: 'on tam rgyun du zhugs @4b pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: 'on tam rgyun du zhugs @4b pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
translated: or else it is the fruit of stream-enterer, the monastic community.🔽It is the monastic community for the sake of the fruit of once-returner,

original: 'on tam lan gcig phyir 'od ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: 'on tam lan gcig phyir 'od ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
translated: or else it is the fruit of once-returner, the monastic community.🔽It is the monastic community for the sake of the fruit of non-returner,

original: 'on tam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /
analyzed: 'on tam phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /
translated: or else it is the fruit of non-returner, the monastic community.

original: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir dge 'dun nam /
translated: It is the monastic community for the sake of the fruit of arhatship,

original: 'on tam dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /
analyzed: 'on tam dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dge 'dun /
translated: or else it is the fruit of arhatship, the monastic community.

original: gsum rig pa nyid dge 'dun nam /🔽drug mngon par shes pa dge 'dun nam /
analyzed: gsum rig pa nyid dge 'dun nam / drug mngon par shes pa dge 'dun nam /
translated: It is the monastic community that is the one who knows the three,🔽or else it is the monastic community that is the one with the six superknowledges,

original: 'on tam khong du chud par nan tan du byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa /
analyzed: 'on tam khong du chud par nan tan du byed pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa /
translated: or else it is the pure life that is the earnest practice of understanding.

original: de ste bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de ste bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is the pure life that is the taking up of the training,

original: tha dad du gnas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: tha dad du gnas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as something separate,

original: yongs su dag pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as something pure,

original: slob dpon gyi tshig bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi tshig bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as the words of the master,

original: lan gsum du bzlas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: lan gsum du bzlas pa bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as a threefold repetition,

original: mkhan po bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: mkhan po bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as the preceptor,

original: skra bregs pa dang / ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
analyzed: skra bregs pa dang / ngur smrig gi gos 'chang ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /
translated: the taking of the precepts as shaving the head and wearing saffron robes,

original: slong mos 'tsho ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am /🔽'on tam de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa'am zhes de ltar chos de dag la rnam par sgom na /
analyzed: slong mos 'tsho ba bslab pa yang dag par blang ba'am / 'on tam de dag tshangs pa'i spyod pa'am zhes de ltar chos de dag la rnam par sgom na /
translated: the taking of the precepts as living on alms,🔽or is it the practice of celibacy?

original: bdag gi lus la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / sgom pa la zhen pa med pa dang / chos @5a *//
analyzed: bdag gi lus la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / sgom pa la zhen pa med pa dang / chos @5a *//
translated: When they contemplate those phenomena in that way, they will not be attached to their own bodies, will not be attached to meditation, and will not be attached to the Dharma.

original: rnams gnas pa med pa dang / 'das pa rgyu ba med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma phyin pa dang / da ltar byung ba stong pa dang / las la byed pa med pa dang / rnam par smin pa la tshor ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rnams gnas pa med pa dang / 'das pa rgyu ba med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma phyin pa dang / da ltar byung ba stong pa dang / las la byed pa med pa dang / rnam par smin pa la tshor ba med pa dang /
translated: that the past does not move, that the future does not arrive, that the present is empty, that actions are without a doer, that there is no feeling in ripening,🔽that there is no transference of this world, and that the other world is not wasted.

original: 'jig rten 'di 'phos pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol chud mi za ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di 'phos pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol chud mi za ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin /
translated: What is that Dharma called pure conduct?

original: de gang las byung /
analyzed: de gang las byung /
translated: Where does it come from?

original: de su'i / de ci zhig /
analyzed: de su'i / de ci zhig /
translated: Whose is it? What is it?

original: de sus byas /
analyzed: de sus byas /
translated: Who created it?

original: de yod dam /
analyzed: de yod dam /
translated: Does it exist?

original: de med dam /
analyzed: de med dam /
translated: Does it not exist?

original: de gzugs sam /
analyzed: de gzugs sam /
translated: Is it form?

original: de gzugs ma yin nam /🔽de tshor ba'am /
analyzed: de gzugs ma yin nam / de tshor ba'am /
translated: Is it not form?🔽Is it feeling?

original: de tshor ba ma yin nam; de 'du shes sam /

translated: is mentally engaged without attachment, is unobscured in the mind, and is practiced without duality.

original: bsgribs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos gzung ba dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pas tshangs @5b pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par yid la bya'o //
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i chos gzung ba dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pas tshangs @5b pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par yid la bya'o //
translated: The pure conduct of Brahmā should be mentally engaged by the unobscured application, the apprehension of the Dharma without signs, the understanding of the Dharma without characteristics, the sameness of the buddhadharmas, and the correct contemplation of all the buddhadharmas.

analyzed: gong du yang chos bcu dang ldan pas yid la bya ste /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / rnam par smin pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par ldang ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus tha dad pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa mchog dang / tha ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang /

translated: the knowledge of what is possible and impossible, the knowledge of the past, future, and present karma and its ripening, the knowledge of the absorptions, liberations, samādhis,🔽and attainments, the knowledge of the afflictions, purification, and emergence, the knowledge of the different faculties, the knowledge of the supreme and inferior faculties,

original: mos pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang ldan pa dang / lha'i mig thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: mos pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / khams tha dad pa dang / khams du ma shes pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang ldan pa dang / lha'i mig thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /

original: bsgribs pa med pa rjes su dran pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par gcad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa rjes su dran pa shes pa dang ldan pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par gcad pa shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: He is endowed with the knowledge of the unobscured recollection of past lives. He is endowed with the knowledge of the eradication of the propensities.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs re re la yang rnam par dbye ba shin tu rgya che bar khong du chud par bya'o //

analyzed: de de ltar zhugs pas nyon mongs pa chung bar sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro //

original: tshul de ltar sems bskyed pa re rer mnyes par byed pas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig pas zhal zas bro ba'i mchog brjod du med pa zhes bya ba nas gzhan yang rgya cher te

translated: In the same way, by pleasing the buddhas with each of his or her bodhicitta thoughts, the bodhisattva pleases the buddhas in the inexpressibly vast universes to the east, together with all the beings in those universes, with food of the highest quality, with inexpressibly vast offerings and so on, as described in the sutra.

original: / de lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa mnyes par byas pa nas kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: / de lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa mnyes par byas pa nas kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O children of the buddhas!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la bskal pa brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la bskal pa brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
translated: The merit of the bodhisattva who first generates the mind of enlightenment is not approached even by a hundredth part of the merit that arises from worshiping and serving buddhas for eons equal to inexpressible numbers of eons.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyes pa de tsam nyi tshe zhig mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'am /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / de ni / 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyes pa de tsam nyi tshe zhig mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba'am /
translated: O son of the conquerors!🔽It is because bodhisattva great beings do not generate the mind of unsurpassable, perfect enlightenment for the sake of merely that much worship and service of buddhas who have been born,

original: sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de tsam dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de tsam dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye'i /
translated: or for the sake of merely that much of the requisites for worshiping buddhas.

original: de ni / 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: It is like this: all the infinite world systems without exception are pervaded by the realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi @25a *//🔽mthas gtugs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi @25a *// mthas gtugs pa /
translated: They extend to the limits of space.

original: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /🔽phyogs bcu tshad las 'das pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa / phyogs bcu tshad las 'das pa /
translated: They are beyond being described as inexpressible.

original: 'byams klas pa /
analyzed: 'byams klas pa /
translated: They are beyond measure in the ten directions.🔽They are infinite.

original: phyogs kyi rnam grangs mtha' yas pa'i dra bas khyab pa /
analyzed: phyogs kyi rnam grangs mtha' yas pa'i dra bas khyab pa /
translated: They are pervaded by an infinite number of directions.

original: mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas bsam yas pa /
analyzed: mig 'phrul gyi rnam pas bsam yas pa /
translated: They are inconceivable in the manner of a magical display.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi mnyam par chud pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzhi mnyam par chud pa /
translated: All world systems are included in the same ground.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par 'dus pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par 'dus pa'i tshul shin tu bstan pa /
translated: They are well taught in the manner of the inclusion of all world systems.

original: 'du shes kyi rnam pa la gnas pa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par phye ba la gnas pa thams cad du gtogs pa /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rnam pa la gnas pa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par phye ba la gnas pa thams cad du gtogs pa /
translated: They are included in all the divisions of the net of directions that are based on the aspects of perception.

original: lhag ma med pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs dang tshul shin tu bstan pa dag tu sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa bgrangs pa'i tshul shin tu bstan par gtogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis mngon par thugs su
analyzed: lhag ma med pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs dang tshul shin tu bstan pa dag tu sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa bgrangs pa'i tshul shin tu bstan par gtogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis mngon par thugs su
translated: In the way of teaching the enumeration and manner of all the world systems without exception, the way of teaching the enumeration of kalpas that extends to the limit of the past, and the way of omniscient wisdom,

original: chud pa dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed nub par gyur te /
analyzed: chud pa dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed nub par gyur te /
translated: the bhagavān buddhas who have passed into parinirvāṇa,

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang da ltar byung ba'i dus na da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang da ltar byung ba'i dus na da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
translated: the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas who will appear in all the world systems in the future, and the bhagavān buddhas who are presently residing, sustaining themselves, and teaching the Dharma in the ten directions,

original: chos ston pa de dag thams cad mchod cing rim gro @25b bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te /
analyzed: chos ston pa de dag thams cad mchod cing rim gro @25b bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te /
translated: In order to worship and serve all those Dharma teachers, the bodhisattvas give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems bskyed pa de skyes ma thag nas de dang der 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa dang / sngon gyi mur gyur pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mngon par thugs su chud pa de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de skyes ma thag nas de dang der 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa dang / sngon gyi mur gyur pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mngon par thugs su chud pa de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub
translated: As soon as that mind of awakening arises, they are born in those places, and in the past, as many as there are, and in the future, as many as there are, they are born in those places where those thus-gone ones have realized those things.

original: sems dpa' yid ches so //
analyzed: sems dpa' yid ches so //
translated: The bodhisattvas believe that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa de dang / de'i dus su gtogs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur bstan pa dpag tu med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ma byon pa de dang / de'i dus su gtogs pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur bstan pa dpag tu med pa /
translated: The thus-gone ones of the future, and the teachings of the limitless future that belong to that time,

original: mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa dpag tu med pa dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches so //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa dpag tu med pa dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches so //
translated: He also believes in the roots of virtue of all the Blessed Buddhas who have appeared in the past, in the countless, immeasurable teachings without center or edge.

original: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches shing yongs
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' de yid ches shing yongs
translated: He also believes in,

original: su 'dzin par byed /
analyzed: su 'dzin par byed /
translated: takes up,

original: yongs su rgyas par byed /
analyzed: yongs su rgyas par byed /
translated: spreads,🔽attains,

original: rab tu thob par byed /🔽khong du chud par byed /
analyzed: rab tu thob par byed / khong du chud par byed /
translated: understands,

original: rab tu reg par byed /
analyzed: rab tu reg par byed /
translated: touches,

original: shin tu sgrub par byed /🔽rgyud gcig tu gyur par byed /
analyzed: shin tu sgrub par byed / rgyud gcig tu gyur par byed /
translated: accomplishes,🔽and makes into one stream the roots of virtue of all the Blessed Buddhas of the present, who have attained complete buddhahood in the teachings of the Tathāgatas without center or edge, without exception.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byed do //
translated: He also understands the sameness of all the Buddhas.

original: @26a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @26a *// de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni /
translated: It is because that thought of awakening

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdung rgyud mi 'chad pa'i phyir skye'o //🔽'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdung rgyud mi 'chad pa'i phyir skye'o // 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: arises in order to not cut off the lineage of all the tathāgatas.🔽It arises in order to fill all the worlds without exception.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can yongs su bsgral ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: It arises in order to liberate all sentient beings in all the worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du ba dang / 'jig pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'du ba dang / 'jig pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: It arises in order to know the formation and destruction of all the worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: It arises in order to know the defilement and purification of all sentient beings in all the worlds.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi srid pa gsum yongs su dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi srid pa gsum yongs su dag pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: It arises in order to know the complete purification of the three existences in all the worlds.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: He is born in order to know the thoughts, habitual tendencies, and latent tendencies of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi shi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi shi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: He is born in order to know the deaths and rebirths of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang / sbyor ba yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: He is born in order to know the faculties and practices of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye'o //
translated: He is born in order to know the minds and conduct of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye ste /🔽sems bskyed @26b pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dag dang nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir skye ste / sems bskyed @26b pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dag dang nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is born in order to know the cognition of the three times of all sentient beings.🔽By that production of the thought, he becomes close to the Blessed Buddhas of the past.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes close to the Blessed Buddhas of the future and the present.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o //
translated: He approaches the enlightenment of the Buddhas of the past.🔽He approaches the enlightenment of the Buddhas of the future.

original: ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu nye bar 'gro'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He approaches the enlightenment of the Buddhas of the present.🔽He obtains the Dharma of the Buddhas of the past.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He obtains the Dharma of the Buddhas of the future.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi chos kyang thob par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o //
translated: He obtains the Dharma of the Buddhas of the present.🔽He approaches sameness with the Buddhas of the past.🔽He approaches sameness with the Buddhas of the future.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ba byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ba byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams dang mnyam pa nyid du nye bar 'gro'o //
translated: He approaches sameness with the Buddhas of the present.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: He purifies the accumulation of knowledge of the Buddhas of the past.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The wisdom accumulations of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, who have not yet come, and of those who are present now, will also be purified.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i stobs la thub pa med pa yang shin tu brtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i stobs la thub pa med pa yang shin tu brtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The invincible power of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past, future, and present, will also become very firm.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag pa'ang @27a *//
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag pa'ang @27a *//
translated: The Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past, future, and present, will also purify their fearlessness.

original: yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They will also perfect it.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang rjes su 'thob bo //
translated: They will also attain the equality of the ornaments of the Buddha’s Dharma that should be taught by the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He also perfects the ornaments of the Buddha’s Dharma that are to be taught by the Bhagavat Buddhas who have not yet come into the world or who are present now.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rjes su 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang rjes su 'thob bo //
translated: He also attains the wisdom of the Buddhas, which is the understanding of the equality of the three times, which is taught in the realm of the Dharma, which is without end or middle, and which is the end of the realm of space.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: de ltar de ni /🔽sangs rgyas su shog cig ces bya ba'i sems bskyed pa des 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin /🔽ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin /
analyzed: de ltar de ni / sangs rgyas su shog cig ces bya ba'i sems bskyed pa des 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye ba yin /
translated: Because in this way🔽he is close to the Bhagavat Buddhas of the past,🔽he is close to the Bhagavat Buddhas of the future and the present,

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams dang mnyam pa yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams dang mnyam pa yin /
translated: and he is equal to the objects of the Buddhas of the past, the future, and the present.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin no //
translated: It is equal to the qualities of the buddhas of the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mnyam pa yin /
translated: It is equal to the qualities of the buddhas of the future and the present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod yul thams cad dang mnyam pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod yul thams cad dang mnyam pa yin /
translated: It is equal to the entire domain of the qualities of the buddhas.

original: gcig tu nges pa'i lus gcig tu gyur pas kyang dus gsum du mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes @27b dang 'grogs pa yang thob pa ste /
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa'i lus gcig tu gyur pas kyang dus gsum du mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes @27b dang 'grogs pa yang thob pa ste /
translated: It is the attainment of the wisdom of all the buddhas, who are equal in the three times, through the single body that is the single certainty.

original: ye shes de dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed par 'byung ba de skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
analyzed: ye shes de dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed par 'byung ba de skyes ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang ched du brjod pa mdzad do //
translated: As soon as that bodhicitta, which is the attainment of that wisdom, arises, the blessed buddhas of the ten directions proclaim it.

original: mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas chos mthong mi ngoms pa //
analyzed: mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas chos mthong mi ngoms pa //
translated: The wise ones who are never satisfied with seeing the Buddha’s Dharma

original: de dag chos rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam par chud pa yin //
analyzed: de dag chos rnams rgya mtsho'i rnam par chud pa yin //
translated: Are immersed in the ocean of the Dharma.

original: 'jig rten lam rgyud kun la su zhig snying brtse zhing //
analyzed: 'jig rten lam rgyud kun la su zhig snying brtse zhing //
translated: Those who always have compassion for all the worlds in the world systems

original: 'jig @30b rten gsum po sbyang par rtag tu zhugs pa rnams //
analyzed: 'jig @30b rten gsum po sbyang par rtag tu zhugs pa rnams //
translated: And are always engaged in purifying the three worlds

original: phyi ma'i mthar thug sangs rgyas gdung gi rgyun mi gcod //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar thug sangs rgyas gdung gi rgyun mi gcod //
translated: Will not cut off the lineage of the buddhas until the end of time.

original: de ni bdud kyi khyim yang rab tu 'joms pa yin //
analyzed: de ni bdud kyi khyim yang rab tu 'joms pa yin //
translated: They will also conquer the realm of Māra.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang rgyud gcig dngos gyur cing //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams dang rgyud gcig dngos gyur cing //
translated: They will become of the same continuum as the victorious ones of the three times

original: shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis lam la rtag brtson te //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba'i tshul gyis lam la rtag brtson te //
translated: And will always be diligent on the path through the most subtle way.

original: su zhig sangs rgyas yul la dad sems pa //
analyzed: su zhig sangs rgyas yul la dad sems pa //
translated: Those who have faith in the domain of the buddhas

original: de ni chags med thub pa kun gyis dbang yang bskur //
analyzed: de ni chags med thub pa kun gyis dbang yang bskur //
translated: Will also be empowered by all the buddhas without attachment.

original: rdo rje lta bur sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bur sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa //
translated: They will be as solid, stable, and indestructible as a vajra.

original: rkang gnyis gtso bos mdzad pa rtag tu dran shes shing //
analyzed: rkang gnyis gtso bos mdzad pa rtag tu dran shes shing //
translated: They will always be mindful of the deeds of the chief of humans.

original: 'dren pa'i spyod yul snang rab shin tu rnyed pa rnams; ;gzhan gyi dring la mi rgyug byang chub sems kyang skye //
analyzed: 'dren pa'i spyod yul snang rab shin tu rnyed pa rnams; ;gzhan gyi dring la mi rgyug byang chub sems kyang skye //
translated: They do not follow others, and the thought of enlightenment arises.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rnam pa mang shes shing //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi 'du shes rnam pa mang shes shing //
translated: They know the many kinds of perceptions of beings,

original: de bzhin las dang 'bras bu sems kyi rnams kyang ste //
analyzed: de bzhin las dang 'bras bu sems kyi rnams kyang ste //
translated: And likewise the results of actions and the mind.

original: gzhan yang dbang po'i mthu dang khams rnams dus ma dag /
analyzed: gzhan yang dbang po'i mthu dang khams rnams dus ma dag /
translated: Moreover, the powers of the senses, the elements, and time,

original: kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul gcig yin no //
analyzed: kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul gcig yin no //
translated: All are the field of activity of the bodhisattvas.

original: gang zhig chos kyi dbyings bzhin byang chub sems yangs shing //
analyzed: gang zhig chos kyi dbyings bzhin byang chub sems yangs shing //
translated: Those whose thought of enlightenment is vast like the realm of phenomena,

original: rtag tu chos la mi gnas nam mkha' ji bzhin pa //
analyzed: rtag tu chos la mi gnas nam mkha' ji bzhin pa //
translated: Who are always unattached to phenomena like the sky,

original: chags med sems ldan de dag sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs //
analyzed: chags med sems ldan de dag sangs rgyas ye shes zhugs //
translated: Those whose minds are free of attachment enter the wisdom of the buddhas.🔽They are without conceptualization, abide in the limit of reality,

original: de dag rtogs med chos can yang dag mtha' la gnas; ;sems can bsam pa rnam 'byed sems can 'du shes med //
analyzed: de dag rtogs med chos can yang dag mtha' la gnas; ;sems can bsam pa rnam 'byed sems can 'du shes med //
translated: Analyze the thoughts of beings, but have no perception of beings,

original: chos kyi rnam rtog khrag khrig pha mthar rab tu phyin //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam rtog khrag khrig pha mthar rab tu phyin //
translated: And have perfected the many quintillions of Dharma concepts.

original: de dag rtog la mos shing rnam par mi rtog ste //
analyzed: de dag rtog la mos shing rnam par mi rtog ste //
translated: They are devoted to the thought of the buddhas, but are free of conceptualization.

original: de @31a *// dag zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rjes su zhugs //
analyzed: de @31a *// dag zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rjes su zhugs //
translated: They are engaged in the ten directions of the buddhafields.

original: gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rjes sems shing //
analyzed: gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rjes sems shing //
translated: They are engaged in the thought of the buddhas, in the ten directions,

original: gang zhig chos dbyings tshul gyi mdzod du zhugs gyur la //
analyzed: gang zhig chos dbyings tshul gyi mdzod du zhugs gyur la //
translated: They are engaged in the treasury of the way of the realm of phenomena.

original: gang zhig sems can dbang po'i rnam pa'i mthar phyin pa //
analyzed: gang zhig sems can dbang po'i rnam pa'i mthar phyin pa //
translated: They have reached the end of the way of the faculties of sentient beings.

original: de dag sems can gtso bzhin chos nyid shes pa yin //
analyzed: de dag sems can gtso bzhin chos nyid shes pa yin //
translated: They know the nature of sentient beings to be the nature of the buddhas.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang rtag par mngon ldan zhing //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang rtag par mngon ldan zhing //
translated: They are always endowed with a pure superior intention.

original: skyes bu'i sengge'i bsnyen bkur phyir ldog mi 'gyur la //
analyzed: skyes bu'i sengge'i bsnyen bkur phyir ldog mi 'gyur la //
translated: They are not turned back by the service to the lion among men.

original: 'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa mthong bas mi ngoms pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gtso bo mkhas pa mthong bas mi ngoms pa //
translated: They are never satisfied by seeing the chief of the world, the wise one.

original: de dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig bye bas byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig bye bas byin gyis brlabs //
translated: They are blessed by quintillions of buddhas.

original: zab mo'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed kyang chags pa med //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos rnams rnam par 'byed kyang chags pa med //
translated: They are free of attachment, even though they analyze the profound Dharma.

original: gnas pa med pas sems kyi dam pa rtag tu dag /
analyzed: gnas pa med pas sems kyi dam pa rtag tu dag /
translated: They are always pure in their supreme minds, because they are without abode.

original: de dag bskal pa mtha' yas skyes bu sengge'i sems //
analyzed: de dag bskal pa mtha' yas skyes bu sengge'i sems //
translated: They are the lions of men, who have been born for infinite eons,

original: dus gsum chags pa med par rtogs pa'i yid dang ldan //
analyzed: dus gsum chags pa med par rtogs pa'i yid dang ldan //
translated: And have minds that realize the three times without attachment.🔽They have the faculty of mind that cannot be taken away or overpowered,

original: mi 'phrog thub par mi nus yid kyi dbang po dang // gsum pa rjes su song dang rtag tu ldan gyur cing //
analyzed: mi 'phrog thub par mi nus yid kyi dbang po dang // gsum pa rjes su song dang rtag tu ldan gyur cing //
translated: And they are always endowed with the third, which is the one that follows.

original: chos rnams 'byams klas shin tu bslab pas rmongs med pa //
analyzed: chos rnams 'byams klas shin tu bslab pas rmongs med pa //
translated: They are not confused about the vast training in phenomena,

original: de dag chos dbyings 'gengs kyang nam yang mi ngoms so //
analyzed: de dag chos dbyings 'gengs kyang nam yang mi ngoms so //
translated: And they are never satisfied with filling the realm of phenomena.

original: tshig gi lam 'das ji bzhin mkhas pa zhi ba shes //
analyzed: tshig gi lam 'das ji bzhin mkhas pa zhi ba shes //
translated: The wise ones know the peace that is beyond the path of words,

original: de bzhin nyid la nam yang rnam par mi 'byed pa //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la nam yang rnam par mi 'byed pa //
translated: And they never discriminate within suchness.

original: de dag sangs rgyas thams cad yul la rjes sems shing //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas thams cad yul la rjes sems shing //
translated: They contemplate the object of all the buddhas,

original: dus gsum chags pa med pa rtogs @31b pa'i yid ldan 'gyur //
analyzed: dus gsum chags pa med pa rtogs @31b pa'i yid ldan 'gyur //
translated: And they have minds that realize the three times without attachment.

original: mkhas pa gang zhig sems bskyed 'byams klas chos kyi dbyings //
analyzed: mkhas pa gang zhig sems bskyed 'byams klas chos kyi dbyings //
translated: The wise ones generate the mind that fills the infinite realm of phenomena

original: 'gengs shing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro ba ni //
analyzed: 'gengs shing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro ba ni //
translated: And goes to the buddha realms in the ten directions.

original: de dag khrag khrig tshul rnams brjod du med pa yi //
analyzed: de dag khrag khrig tshul rnams brjod du med pa yi //
translated: The ways of these are inexpressible in billions.🔽

original: snang ba rnyed par gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras yin no //
analyzed: snang ba rnyed par gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sras yin no //
translated: They are the bodhisattvas who have attained the light of the Dharma.

original: chos rab mu stegs snying rje'i tshul gyi rjes song zhing //
analyzed: chos rab mu stegs snying rje'i tshul gyi rjes song zhing //
translated: They are the ones who follow the way of compassion and the Dharma,

original: byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa bar snang ji bzhin te //
analyzed: byams pa'i pha rol phyin pa bar snang ji bzhin te //
translated: who have perfected love like the sky,

original: sems can khams la nam yang yongs su rtog med pa //
analyzed: sems can khams la nam yang yongs su rtog med pa //
translated: who never conceptualize the realms of sentient beings,

original: de dag rnam rtog med la brtson zhing 'jig rten spyod //
analyzed: de dag rnam rtog med la brtson zhing 'jig rten spyod //
translated: who are diligent in the absence of conceptualization, and who engage in worldly activity.

original: phyogs bcu dag tu bden pas 'gro ba yid 'bebs par //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu bden pas 'gro ba yid 'bebs par //
translated: They are the ones who, through the truth, captivate the minds of beings in the ten directions,

original: dong bas sems can gtso bo de dag kun tu rgyu //
analyzed: dong bas sems can gtso bo de dag kun tu rgyu //
translated: and who, as the foremost of sentient beings, move throughout the world.

original: bden pa'i tshig brtson rtag tu nges pa'i sems ldan pa //
analyzed: bden pa'i tshig brtson rtag tu nges pa'i sems ldan pa //
translated: They are the ones who are diligent in the words of truth and who always have a definite mind,

original: de dag phyogs bcu'i mi yi mchog gis byin gyis brlabs //🔽'das par gyur pa'i dus kyang de dag rjes su dran //
analyzed: de dag phyogs bcu'i mi yi mchog gis byin gyis brlabs // 'das par gyur pa'i dus kyang de dag rjes su dran //
translated: and who are blessed by the supreme humans of the ten directions.🔽They are the ones who recollect the past,

original: de bzhin ma 'ongs dus la 'jug pa rnam par sgom //
analyzed: de bzhin ma 'ongs dus la 'jug pa rnam par sgom //
translated: and who likewise cultivate the engagement with the future.

original: de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na mi gnas te //
analyzed: de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na mi gnas te //
translated: They are the ones who do not abide anywhere in the worlds of the ten directions,

original: sems can phan dang dgrol phyir kun tu rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: sems can phan dang dgrol phyir kun tu rnam par rgyu //
translated: They are always active for the sake of sentient beings and for their liberation.

original: ye shes 'od mchog dam pas chags pa med gyur la //
analyzed: ye shes 'od mchog dam pas chags pa med gyur la //
translated: They have the highest, supreme, and pure light of wisdom.

original: rgyu yi rnam pa chos rab nem nur med brtan rnams //
analyzed: rgyu yi rnam pa chos rab nem nur med brtan rnams //
translated: They have the steadfast qualities of the aspects of the path.

original: de dag the tshom thams cad rnam par zlog pa byed //
analyzed: de dag the tshom thams cad rnam par zlog pa byed //
translated: They eliminate all the doubts of sentient beings.

original: chos kyi dbyings 'dir nem nur med par rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings 'dir nem nur med par rab tu 'jug /
translated: They are free of doubt in this realm of phenomena.🔽They destroy the abodes of all the māras.

original: gang zhig bdud rnams kun gyi gnas rnams 'joms byed dang // gang yang sems can @32a *//
analyzed: gang zhig bdud rnams kun gyi gnas rnams 'joms byed dang // gang yang sems can @32a *//
translated: They eliminate the darkness of sentient beings.

original: rab rib shin tu sel byed dang // gang rnams rtog pa 'jig cing rnam rtog mi 'grogs pa //
analyzed: rab rib shin tu sel byed dang // gang rnams rtog pa 'jig cing rnam rtog mi 'grogs pa //
translated: They destroy concepts and are free of discursive thoughts.

original: sems can gtso bo de dag yul la the tshom med //
analyzed: sems can gtso bo de dag yul la the tshom med //
translated: Those supreme beings have no doubt about their objects.

original: dus gsum ma lus the tshom rnam par bzlog byas shing //
analyzed: dus gsum ma lus the tshom rnam par bzlog byas shing //
translated: They eliminate all doubts about the three times.

original: bsam pa'i mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung 'gro ste //
analyzed: bsam pa'i mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung 'gro ste //
translated: With the highest intention they approach the tathāgatas.

original: dad pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing blo brtan rnyed pa rnams //
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing blo brtan rnyed pa rnams //
translated: They have the power of faith, a steadfast mind, and have attained

original: de dag don rtogs khong du chud cing blo yang dag /
analyzed: de dag don rtogs khong du chud cing blo yang dag /
translated: the realization of the meaning, the understanding, and the mind.

original: mkhas pa 'gro ba'i don du phyi ma'i mthar spro ste //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'gro ba'i don du phyi ma'i mthar spro ste //
translated: The wise are delighted to the end of time for the sake of beings.

original: sems can don du rnam thar 'byams klas yongs su 'tshol //
analyzed: sems can don du rnam thar 'byams klas yongs su 'tshol //
translated: They seek out the infinite liberation for the sake of beings.

original: yun ring dus su skyo ba med cing zhum pa med //
analyzed: yun ring dus su skyo ba med cing zhum pa med //
translated: For a long time, they are not discouraged or disheartened.

original: sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal mang po zlog par byed //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal mang po zlog par byed //
translated: They turn away the many sufferings of the hells of beings.

original: de dag bsod nams mi zad ye shes ldan //
analyzed: de dag bsod nams mi zad ye shes ldan //
translated: They have inexhaustible merit and wisdom.

original: 'gro ba'i dbang po sna tshogs bsam la rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dbang po sna tshogs bsam la rab tu 'jug /
translated: They engage in the various faculties of beings.

original: skye rgu'i las kyi rgyud kyang shin tu shes byas shing //
analyzed: skye rgu'i las kyi rgyud kyang shin tu shes byas shing //
translated: They also understand the various actions of beings.

original: bsam pa ji bzhin tshul 'dra'i chos rnams mtha' yas brjod //
analyzed: bsam pa ji bzhin tshul 'dra'i chos rnams mtha' yas brjod //
translated: They speak the Dharma in accord with their aspirations.

original: 'gro la byams pa'i sa rnams kun dang rjes su ldan //
analyzed: 'gro la byams pa'i sa rnams kun dang rjes su ldan //
translated: They are endowed with the love for beings in all the stages.

original: bdag med nyid rtogs 'on kyang btang snyoms byed pa min //
analyzed: bdag med nyid rtogs 'on kyang btang snyoms byed pa min //
translated: They realize selflessness, but they are not indifferent.

original: de dag snying brtse gcig tu gsal bar chos kyang brjod //
analyzed: de dag snying brtse gcig tu gsal bar chos kyang brjod //
translated: They speak the Dharma with a single clear compassion.

original: 'on kyang dmigs par mi gnas de dag 'jig rten rgyu //
analyzed: 'on kyang dmigs par mi gnas de dag 'jig rten rgyu //
translated: But they do not abide in reference points, and they are the friends of the world.

original: de dag 'od zer dra ba sna tshogs mdog bkye zhing //
analyzed: de dag 'od zer dra ba sna tshogs mdog bkye zhing //
translated: They radiate various nets of light rays.

original: 'gro ba'i mun pa bsal te kun tu snang byas nas //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mun pa bsal te kun tu snang byas nas //
translated: Having dispelled the darkness of beings and illuminated all,

original: 'od zer sgo yi padmo dag la @32b rgyal sras rnams //
analyzed: 'od zer sgo yi padmo dag la @32b rgyal sras rnams //
translated: The buddhas, the sons of the victors,

original: kun tu bstan de rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyang ston //
analyzed: kun tu bstan de rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyang ston //
translated: Teach the stainless Dharma to the lotuses that are the doors of light.🔽They see in the tip of one hair all the buddhafields

original: spu gcig rtse la zhing rnams rgyal bas brgyan pa dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras kyis brgyan pa mngon par mthong //
analyzed: spu gcig rtse la zhing rnams rgyal bas brgyan pa dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras kyis brgyan pa mngon par mthong //
translated: Adorned with the victors and likewise with the sons of the victors.

original: 'khor rnams blo sems gzhan dang gzhan can dpe med pa //
analyzed: 'khor rnams blo sems gzhan dang gzhan can dpe med pa //
translated: The retinues have different thoughts, incomparable,

original: 'gro ba de dag sems shes rmongs med ston pa byed //🔽sems 'jug gcig gis phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad kyi //
analyzed: 'gro ba de dag sems shes rmongs med ston pa byed // sems 'jug gcig gis phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad kyi //
translated: And the teachers show them the way to know the minds of beings.🔽In a single instant of mind they travel to

original: brjod du med pa khrag khrig zhing rnams kun bgrod cing //
analyzed: brjod du med pa khrag khrig zhing rnams kun bgrod cing //
translated: All the inexpressibly numerous quintillions of buddhafields in the ten directions.

original: song ste sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don du mchod byas nas //
analyzed: song ste sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don du mchod byas nas //
translated: Having gone there, they make offerings to the buddhas for the sake of beings

original: dri ba khrag khrig don dang ldan pa sna tshogs 'dri //
analyzed: dri ba khrag khrig don dang ldan pa sna tshogs 'dri //
translated: And ask inexpressibly numerous meaningful questions.🔽They regard the sugatas as their fathers

original: bde gshegs rnams la pha yi 'du shes nyer bzhag cing //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams la pha yi 'du shes nyer bzhag cing //
translated: And the bodhisattvas as their brothers.

original: chos kyi gter mkhas rtag tu shes rab rnon po can //
analyzed: chos kyi gter mkhas rtag tu shes rab rnon po can //
translated: They are always sharp-witted, skilled in the treasure of the Dharma.

original: ye shes 'byung gnas mkhas pas sangs rgyas chags med phyir //
analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas mkhas pas sangs rgyas chags med phyir //
translated: The wise ones are the source of wisdom, and because of the buddhas’ nonattachment

original: 'gro ba'i don 'dod byang chub mchog gi spyod pa sgrub //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don 'dod byang chub mchog gi spyod pa sgrub //
translated: They practice the conduct of supreme awakening, wishing to benefit beings.

original: gang rnams chos dbyings rnam par phye zhing bsam byas kyang //
analyzed: gang rnams chos dbyings rnam par phye zhing bsam byas kyang //
translated: Those who analyze the realm of phenomena and contemplate

original: bskal pa mang po 'das byas zad par ma gyur te //
analyzed: bskal pa mang po 'das byas zad par ma gyur te //
translated: Do not become exhausted even after many eons have passed.

original: chos nyid gnas med gang la'ang chud par ma gyur kyang //
analyzed: chos nyid gnas med gang la'ang chud par ma gyur kyang //
translated: They do not fall into the absence of a basis for the nature of phenomena,

original: chags med ye shes can rnams skyo sems med par spyod //
analyzed: chags med ye shes can rnams skyo sems med par spyod //
translated: And those with nonattached wisdom practice without becoming weary.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rigs su rigs dang ldan gyur cing //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rigs su rigs dang ldan gyur cing //
translated: They are of the family of the victorious ones of the three times, and they possess the family.

original: bde gshegs kun gyi sku las yang dag byung gyur pas //
analyzed: bde gshegs kun gyi sku las yang dag byung gyur pas //
translated: They are born from the body of all the sugatas.

original: chos kyi lus can de dag 'gro la gzugs lus ston //
analyzed: chos kyi lus can de dag 'gro la gzugs lus ston //
translated: They have the body of the Dharma, but they manifest a physical body for beings.

original: sgyu mkhan mkhas pa yid 'ong sgyu ma ston pa @33a *//
analyzed: sgyu mkhan mkhas pa yid 'ong sgyu ma ston pa @33a *//
translated: Like a skilled magician who displays a beautiful illusion,

original: bzhin; ;mkhas pa de dag la lar spyod pa mchog rnyed snang //
analyzed: bzhin; ;mkhas pa de dag la lar spyod pa mchog rnyed snang //
translated: The wise ones sometimes appear to attain the supreme conduct.

original: la lar mkhas pa skye zhing mya ngan 'das par snang //
analyzed: la lar mkhas pa skye zhing mya ngan 'das par snang //
translated: And in some places they appear to be sages who have attained nirvana.

original: byang chub dam pa'i mchog kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya snang //
analyzed: byang chub dam pa'i mchog kyang rnam par 'tshang rgya snang //
translated: They appear to attain the highest enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: mya ngan 'da' ba ston pa'ang de bzhin la lar snang //🔽rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rgyal ba'i sa min pa'i //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' ba ston pa'ang de bzhin la lar snang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos rgyal ba'i sa min pa'i //
translated: And in some places they appear to demonstrate the attainment of nirvana.

original: chos nyid de la ji ltar rab tu gnas pa ltos //
analyzed: chos nyid de la ji ltar rab tu gnas pa ltos //
translated: “Look how they abide in the nature of reality, which is not the level of the solitary buddhas, the hearers, or the victors.

original: lus dang sgra med bsam med 'du shes ldan pa min //
analyzed: lus dang sgra med bsam med 'du shes ldan pa min //
translated: They have no body, no sound, no thoughts, and no perceptions.

original: 'on kyang bya ba sna tshogs du ma nye bar ston //
