translated: And all the many sentient beings make offerings of incense, flowers, garlands,🔽The finest ointments, parasols, victory banners, food, drink, and clothing.

original: spos dang me tog phreng ba byug pa dam pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bza' btung na bzas mchod par byed //
analyzed: spos dang me tog phreng ba byug pa dam pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bza' btung na bzas mchod par byed //
translated: Moreover, they make offerings with the finest seats, walking paths,

original: gzhan yang gdan gyi rnam pa 'chag sa dam pa dang // pho brang mang po sna tshogs tsandan mchog bsangs pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang gdan gyi rnam pa 'chag sa dam pa dang // pho brang mang po sna tshogs tsandan mchog bsangs pa //
translated: And various palaces, well-perfumed with the finest sandalwood,

original: nor bu rin chen rnam par snang bas brgyan pa dang // yid bzhin nor bu yid 'ong brgyan pas mchod byas te //
analyzed: nor bu rin chen rnam par snang bas brgyan pa dang // yid bzhin nor bu yid 'ong brgyan pas mchod byas te //
translated: Adorned with shining precious jewels, and adorned with delightful wish-fulfilling gems.

original: de ltar bde gshegs sems can mngon par mchod byed pas //
analyzed: de ltar bde gshegs sems can mngon par mchod byed pas //
translated: Thus, by making offerings to the Sugatas and sentient beings,

original: bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med pa zad byas kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med pa zad byas kyang //
translated: For countless trillions of eons,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bde bsags mthar phyin bde ba nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bde bsags mthar phyin bde ba nyid //
translated: The bliss accumulated by the bodhisattvas reaches its culmination.

original: gang bsgrubs byang chub sems la mnyam par nyer mi 'gro /
analyzed: gang bsgrubs byang chub sems la mnyam par nyer mi 'gro /
translated: But the bliss of the one who accomplishes it does not approach even a fraction of the bliss of the bodhicitta.

original: ji snyed dper brjod byas pa 'di dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: ji snyed dper brjod byas pa 'di dag thams cad kyang //
translated: All these examples that are given

original: yang dag skyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi char mi rung //
analyzed: yang dag skyes pa'i byang chub sems kyi char mi rung //
translated: Do not equal even a fraction of the perfect arising of bodhicitta.

original: de yang 'di ltar dus gsum bzhugs pa'i skyes bu mchog /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar dus gsum bzhugs pa'i skyes bu mchog /
translated: And thus, all the supreme beings who dwell in the three times

original: thams cad byang chub sems mchog de las byung ba yin //
analyzed: thams cad byang chub sems mchog de las byung ba yin //
translated: Arise from that supreme bodhicitta.

original: byang chub sems ni chags pa med pa'i @39a *//🔽mthar phyin te //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni chags pa med pa'i @39a *// mthar phyin te //
translated: Bodhicitta is the culmination of non-attachment.

original: thams cad tshad la gnas kyang de la tshad yod min //
analyzed: thams cad tshad la gnas kyang de la tshad yod min //
translated: Though all are established in their measure, it has no measure.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhol zhing tshad med stobs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzhol zhing tshad med stobs //
translated: It is the wisdom of omniscience, inclined and immeasurable strength,

original: sems can rang bzhin de bzhin byang chub mthar yang phyin //
analyzed: sems can rang bzhin de bzhin byang chub mthar yang phyin //
translated: The nature of sentient beings, and the culmination of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems 'di nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'di nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste //
translated: This thought of enlightenment is equal to the limits of space,

original: chos rnams kun la khyab pa chos dbyings ji bzhin no //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la khyab pa chos dbyings ji bzhin no //
translated: Pervading all phenomena, just like the realm of reality.

original: tshad med de bzhin nyid kun de yi spyod yul gyur //
analyzed: tshad med de bzhin nyid kun de yi spyod yul gyur //
translated: It is immeasurable, the universal scope of suchness itself,

original: des ni kun tu khyab pa'i sems can gtso bo bzhin //
analyzed: des ni kun tu khyab pa'i sems can gtso bo bzhin //
translated: And pervades all, like the foremost of beings.

original: de ni 'byams klas chos rnams kun la rjes su zhugs //
analyzed: de ni 'byams klas chos rnams kun la rjes su zhugs //
translated: It is all-pervading, following after all phenomena,

original: des ni zhing rnams ma lus 'byams klas kun tu khyab //
analyzed: des ni zhing rnams ma lus 'byams klas kun tu khyab //
translated: And pervades all the infinite realms without exception.

original: des ni shes pa 'byams klas thams cad rtogs par chud //
analyzed: des ni shes pa 'byams klas thams cad rtogs par chud //
translated: It is the realization of all the infinite knowables,

original: des ni sangs rgyas 'byams klas kun dang 'gal med thob //
analyzed: des ni sangs rgyas 'byams klas kun dang 'gal med thob //
translated: And it is the attainment of the non-contradiction of all the infinite buddhas.

original: rtag tu bsod nams bla na med pa dag dang ldan //
analyzed: rtag tu bsod nams bla na med pa dag dang ldan //
translated: It is always endowed with the highest merit,

original: de bzhin rtag tu tshul khrims rnam dag mi gnas ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin rtag tu tshul khrims rnam dag mi gnas ldan //
translated: And likewise, it is always endowed with the non-abiding pure discipline.

original: rtag tu kun gtong rtag par rab tu dge ba ste //
analyzed: rtag tu kun gtong rtag par rab tu dge ba ste //
translated: It is always the complete giving, always the complete virtue,

original: ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus mchog dang rab tu ldan //
analyzed: ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus mchog dang rab tu ldan //
translated: And it is endowed with the supreme, irreversible effort.

original: bsam gtan mdzod la rtag par bsam gtan 'jug pa byed //
analyzed: bsam gtan mdzod la rtag par bsam gtan 'jug pa byed //
translated: It always engages in meditation on the treasure of meditation.

original: shes rab shin tu langs pa dang yang rtag tu ldan //
analyzed: shes rab shin tu langs pa dang yang rtag tu ldan //
translated: And they are always endowed with the most exalted wisdom.

original: rgyal sras rnams kyi sa rab dam pa gang yod pa //
analyzed: rgyal sras rnams kyi sa rab dam pa gang yod pa //
translated: “The bodhisattvas who are on the most sublime bhūmi

original: de dag don du ye shes kun tu bzang po byung //
analyzed: de dag don du ye shes kun tu bzang po byung //
translated: Have the most excellent wisdom for that purpose.

original: 'gro ba kun na skyes bu sengge gang bzhugs pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun na skyes bu sengge gang bzhugs pa //
translated: The lion-like beings who are present in all worlds

original: de dag gis ni byang chub sems rab byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: de dag gis ni byang chub sems rab byin gyis brlabs //
translated: Are empowered by the bodhisattva mind.

original: @39b ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi dam pas rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: @39b ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi dam pas rab tu brgyan //
translated: They are adorned with the most sublime samādhis and dhāraṇīs,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rdzu 'phrul rnam pas brgyan //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul rdzu 'phrul rnam pas brgyan //
translated: And they are adorned with the miraculous manifestations of the tathāgatas.

original: 'jig rten yun dang 'gro ba rnams kyi ji tsam tshad //
analyzed: 'jig rten yun dang 'gro ba rnams kyi ji tsam tshad //
translated: The duration of the world and the extent of beings,

original: nam mkha'i tshad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu ji tsam pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i tshad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu ji tsam pa //
translated: The extent of space in the ten directions,

original: de dag pas kyang byang chub sems 'di tshad med de //
analyzed: de dag pas kyang byang chub sems 'di tshad med de //
translated: The bodhisattva mind is even more immeasurable than that,

original: de las skyes bu'i sengge kun kyang skyes shing byung //
analyzed: de las skyes bu'i sengge kun kyang skyes shing byung //
translated: And all the lion-like beings are born from it.

original: byang chub sems 'di stobs bcu rnams kyi rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'di stobs bcu rnams kyi rtsa ba ste //
translated: The bodhisattva mind is the root of the ten powers,

original: brtan pa bzhi yi gnas yin so sor shes pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: brtan pa bzhi yi gnas yin so sor shes pa'i rtsa //
translated: The foundation of the four kinds of fearlessness, and the source of the strengths.

original: rgyal ba'i chos rnams bco brgyad yang dag 'byin pa ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i chos rnams bco brgyad yang dag 'byin pa ste //
translated: It is the source of the eighteen qualities of the Victorious Ones.

original: skyes bu gtso bos mkhyen par bya ba'i chos kun 'byin //
analyzed: skyes bu gtso bos mkhyen par bya ba'i chos kun 'byin //
translated: It is the source of all the qualities to be known by the foremost of beings.🔽The form body, which is the accumulation of the supreme marks,🔽The attainment of the dharmakāya, which is nonconceptual and equal,

original: gzugs kyi sku ni mtshan rab rnams kyis bsags pa dang // chos sku mnyam nyid rtog pa mi mnga' brnyes pa dang // 'gro bas mchod pa'i ye shes chags med gang byung ba //
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku ni mtshan rab rnams kyis bsags pa dang // chos sku mnyam nyid rtog pa mi mnga' brnyes pa dang // 'gro bas mchod pa'i ye shes chags med gang byung ba //
translated: And the wisdom that arises in beings, which is free from attachment,

original: kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems 'di yin //
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems 'di yin //
translated: Are all the root and source of this bodhicitta.

original: rang rgyal theg pa 'byung zhing nyan thos theg pa'ang 'byung //
analyzed: rang rgyal theg pa 'byung zhing nyan thos theg pa'ang 'byung //
translated: The Pratyekabuddha Vehicle arises, and the Śrāvaka Vehicle arises.🔽The dhyānas, samādhis, and the bliss of the form realm,

original: bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba gzugs kyi khams rnams dang // gzugs med khams rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba dag /
analyzed: bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba gzugs kyi khams rnams dang // gzugs med khams rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba dag /
translated: And the bliss of the formless realm, which is samādhi,

original: kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no //
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba 'byung gnas byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no //
translated: Are all the root and source of this supreme bodhicitta.🔽The bliss of humans and likewise the lord of gods,

original: mi dang de bzhin lha yi dbang po'i bde ba dang // lam rgyud sna tshogs kun kyang 'di la shin tu sbyangs //
analyzed: mi dang de bzhin lha yi dbang po'i bde ba dang // lam rgyud sna tshogs kun kyang 'di la shin tu sbyangs //
translated: And all the various paths and continuums are well trained in this.

original: brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po'i bde ba gang yod pa //
analyzed: brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po'i bde ba gang yod pa //
translated: Whatever strength there is in the world,

original: kun gyi rtsa ba dang @40a *//
analyzed: kun gyi rtsa ba dang @40a *//
translated: all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.🔽Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,

original: po byang chub sems 'di yin //
analyzed: po byang chub sems 'di yin //
translated: all of them come from wishing for others’ enlightenment.🔽Whatever happiness there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ happiness.🔽Whatever strength there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.🔽Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,

original: ci phyir zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed cing //
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems bskyed cing //
translated: all of them come from wishing for others’ enlightenment.🔽Whatever happiness there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ happiness.🔽Whatever strength there is in the world,

original: pha rol phyin drug brtson par spyad pa rab tu spyod //
analyzed: pha rol phyin drug brtson par spyad pa rab tu spyod //
translated: all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.🔽Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,

original: sems can rnams la'ang spyod pa yang dag rab tu ston //
analyzed: sems can rnams la'ang spyod pa yang dag rab tu ston //
translated: all of them come from wishing for others’ enlightenment.🔽Whatever happiness there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ happiness.🔽Whatever strength there is in the world,

original: des ni khams gsum 'gro ba'i bde ba kun kyang 'byung //🔽sangs rgyas chags med thugs chud don dam mkhyen pa rnams //
analyzed: des ni khams gsum 'gro ba'i bde ba kun kyang 'byung // sangs rgyas chags med thugs chud don dam mkhyen pa rnams //
translated: all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.🔽Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,

original: chos kyi dam pa mchog rnams yang dag kun ston cing //
analyzed: chos kyi dam pa mchog rnams yang dag kun ston cing //
translated: all of them come from wishing for others’ enlightenment.🔽Whatever happiness there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ happiness.

original: rgya chen nyon mongs las las sems can dgrol mdzad de //
analyzed: rgya chen nyon mongs las las sems can dgrol mdzad de //
translated: Whatever strength there is in the world,

original: mya ngan 'das pa dam pa mchog la dgod mdzad pa //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa dam pa mchog la dgod mdzad pa //
translated: all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.🔽Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,🔽all of them come from wishing for others’ enlightenment.🔽Whatever happiness there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ happiness.

original: ye shes 'od zer 'od yangs nyi ma lta bu ste //
analyzed: ye shes 'od zer 'od yangs nyi ma lta bu ste //
translated: Whatever strength there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ benefit.

original: 'gro bar spyod pa dkar pos yongs rgyas zla ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro bar spyod pa dkar pos yongs rgyas zla ba bzhin //
translated: Whatever power there is in the world,🔽all of it comes from wishing for others’ independence.🔽Whatever roots of virtue there are in the world,

original: yon tan shin tu bsags pa tshad med chu lta bu //
analyzed: yon tan shin tu bsags pa tshad med chu lta bu //
translated: all of them come from wishing for others

original: dri med chags pa mi mnga' tshad med mkha' dbyings 'dra //🔽gang zhig yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems yangs pa //
analyzed: dri med chags pa mi mnga' tshad med mkha' dbyings 'dra // gang zhig yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems yangs pa //
translated: Stainless, free of attachment, immeasurable, like the realm of space.🔽Those who aspire to the vast mind of awakening, with its infinite qualities,

original: shin tu che zhing bde skyed tshad med smon byed cing //
analyzed: shin tu che zhing bde skyed tshad med smon byed cing //
translated: To the vast, immeasurable bliss it brings,

original: phyi ma'i mthar thug spyod par smon pas su brtson pa //
analyzed: phyi ma'i mthar thug spyod par smon pas su brtson pa //
translated: And to the conduct that is aspired to until the end of time,

original: de dag sems can gdul ba'i don phyir rtag tu brtson //
analyzed: de dag sems can gdul ba'i don phyir rtag tu brtson //
translated: They are always diligent for the sake of guiding beings.

original: 'jig rten 'byams klas thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir //🔽smon lam bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab dang // stong pa mtshan ma med pa smon med mi gnas pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'byams klas thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir // smon lam bye ba khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab dang // stong pa mtshan ma med pa smon med mi gnas pa'i //
translated: In order to purify all the infinite worlds of the universe,🔽With inconceivable trillions of aspirations,🔽With hundreds of billions of aspirations for emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and nonabiding,

original: smon lam bye ba brgyas ni sems de dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: smon lam bye ba brgyas ni sems de dag par 'gyur //
translated: Their minds become pure.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin nam @40b mkha' lta bu sus rtogs shing //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin nam @40b mkha' lta bu sus rtogs shing //
translated: Those who realize the nature of phenomena to be like space,

original: zhi dang rab zhi nyer zhig thams cad mnyam gzhog pa //
analyzed: zhi dang rab zhi nyer zhig thams cad mnyam gzhog pa //
translated: Who rest in the peace, the utter peace, and the complete peace of everything,

original: de dag chos grangs khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
analyzed: de dag chos grangs khrag khrig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
translated: With the inconceivable trillions of Dharma categories,

original: grangs su 'gro la ston kyang de ni gnas pa med //
analyzed: grangs su 'gro la ston kyang de ni gnas pa med //
translated: Even if you were to count for countless eons,🔽You would not reach the end of the qualities of the mind of awakening.

original: phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gtso bo ji snyed pa //
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gtso bo ji snyed pa //
translated: All the leaders of the worlds in the ten directions

original: de dag kun gyis byang chub sems mchog 'di bsngags te //
analyzed: de dag kun gyis byang chub sems mchog 'di bsngags te //
translated: Praise this supreme mind of awakening.

original: yon tan brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pas kyang brgyan //
analyzed: yon tan brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pas kyang brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with hundreds of thousands of inconceivable qualities.

original: sems can gtso bzhin yongs dag pha rol phyin pa yin //
analyzed: sems can gtso bzhin yongs dag pha rol phyin pa yin //
translated: It is the perfection of purity, just like the foremost being.

original: bskal pa sems can snyed du gal te legs brjod kyang //
analyzed: bskal pa sems can snyed du gal te legs brjod kyang //
translated: Even if you were to praise it for as many eons as there are sentient beings,

original: byang chub sems rab de la mthar thug gang yang med //
analyzed: byang chub sems rab de la mthar thug gang yang med //
translated: You would not reach the end of the supreme mind of awakening.

original: rgyal ba 'byung ba'i rigs chen der ni gang skyes pa //
analyzed: rgyal ba 'byung ba'i rigs chen der ni gang skyes pa //
translated: One who is born into that great family of the victors

original: de yi dpe ni khams gsum glongs kyang gang yang med //
analyzed: de yi dpe ni khams gsum glongs kyang gang yang med //
translated: Has no example in the three realms.🔽The supreme mind of awakening is the accumulation

original: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gang zhig rnam bsags pa'i; ;byang chub sems rab de la smon lam kun gyi gyis //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gang zhig rnam bsags pa'i; ;byang chub sems rab de la smon lam kun gyi gyis //
translated: Of all the victors of the three times.

original: byang chub sems rab dam pa de ni bsod nams gter //
analyzed: byang chub sems rab dam pa de ni bsod nams gter //
translated: The supreme mind of awakening is a treasure of merit.

original: des ni rgyal sras chags pa med pa rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: des ni rgyal sras chags pa med pa rab tu 'thob //
translated: Through it, the victors’ heirs attain perfect freedom from attachment.

original: 'gro ba'i sems dang spyod pa shes shing mthong rung srid //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sems dang spyod pa shes shing mthong rung srid //
translated: It is possible to know and see the minds and actions of beings,

original: zhing rnams rdul du blags te bgrangs par nus kyang srid //
analyzed: zhing rnams rdul du blags te bgrangs par nus kyang srid //
translated: And it is possible to count the atoms in the buddha-fields,

original: bar snang skra yis mnyam par gzhal bar nus srid kyi //
analyzed: bar snang skra yis mnyam par gzhal bar nus srid kyi //
translated: And it is possible to measure the sky with a hair,

original: byang chub sems mchog yon tan mthar phyin mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub sems mchog yon tan mthar phyin mi nus so //
translated: But it is not possible to reach the end of the good qualities of the supreme mind of enlightenment.

original: 'di las dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu byung //
analyzed: 'di las dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu byung //
translated: From it come forth all the buddhas of the three times,

original: 'di las 'jig rten 'gro ba kun gyi bde ba 'byung //🔽'di las rgyal @41a *//
analyzed: 'di las 'jig rten 'gro ba kun gyi bde ba 'byung // 'di las rgyal @41a *//
translated: From it comes forth the happiness of all beings in the world,

original: bas bsngags pa'i legs pa thams cad 'byung //
analyzed: bas bsngags pa'i legs pa thams cad 'byung //
translated: From it come forth all the good things praised by the victors,

original: 'dis ni sems can gtso bo the tshom med par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dis ni sems can gtso bo the tshom med par 'gyur //
translated: And from it come forth the chief beings, the bodhisattvas.🔽From it comes the exhaustion of the obscurations of all the worlds,

original: 'dis ni 'jig rten kun gyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur; ;'dis ni zhing rnams yongs su dag pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'jig rten kun gyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur; ;'dis ni zhing rnams yongs su dag pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: From it comes the supreme purity of the buddha-fields,

original: 'di las 'jig rten dam pa shes dang ldan pa 'byung //
analyzed: 'di las 'jig rten dam pa shes dang ldan pa 'byung //
translated: And from it come forth the holy beings who possess knowledge.

original: gang zhig phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba blta bar 'dod pa dang // gang zhig byin dang bsod nams mi zad mdzod 'dod dang // gang zhig 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zlog 'dod pa //
analyzed: gang zhig phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba blta bar 'dod pa dang // gang zhig byin dang bsod nams mi zad mdzod 'dod dang // gang zhig 'gro ba kun gyi sdug bsngal zlog 'dod pa //
translated: those who wish to dispel the suffering of all beings,

original: des ni yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems bskyed bya; ;shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: des ni yon tan mtha' yas byang chub sems bskyed bya; ;shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: they should give rise to the mind of awakening, with its infinite qualities.🔽From the Mahāvaipulya Sūtra

original: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
translated: Called the Buddhâvataṃsaka,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dpe yang dag par bsags pa tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /

analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par phye ba tshad med pa'i lam gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes snang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rgyun ma chad pa dang /
translated: the accumulation of the stores of merit and wisdom, the path of the immeasurable analysis of the perfections, the light of wisdom that does not depend on others, the uninterrupted association with spiritual benefactors,

original: brtson 'grus zhig pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis legs par bslab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas mi skyo ba dang / theg pa'i rgyan shin tu bshams pa dang / ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tu rno ba dang /🔽sa dang sa ma yin pa'i chos kyi sgo la mi gnas pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang @47a *//
analyzed: brtson 'grus zhig pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis legs par bslab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas mi skyo ba dang / theg pa'i rgyan shin tu bshams pa dang / ye shes kyi bsam pa rab tu rno ba dang / sa dang sa ma yin pa'i chos kyi sgo la mi gnas pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang @47a *//
translated: the unceasing diligence, the good training by the transformative power of the Tathagata, the non-wearying application of the roots of virtue, the well-arrayed ornaments of the vehicle, the extremely sharp wisdom intention,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa dag ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa dag ste /
translated: the non-abiding in the Dharma doors of the stages and the non-stages, and the single continuum of the roots of virtue with all the Buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: chos bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa nas sar rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin no //
analyzed: chos bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa nas sar rnam par dgod pa las 'da' ba yin no //
translated: Through these ten dharmas, the Bodhisattvas transcend the stages.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni /🔽thog ma nas sa rnam par dgod pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa yin te; chos kyi sgo gang gis gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi sgo gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni / thog ma nas sa rnam par dgod pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa yin te; chos kyi sgo gang gis gang khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes kyi sgo gang gis thob par 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: These Bodhisattvas🔽are skilled in the initial analysis of all the stages, and they analyze what is to be understood through which Dharma door, what is to be attained through which wisdom door, what is to be accomplished,

original: rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa dang / spyod yul gang yin pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i khyad par gang yin pa dang / ji ltar thob par bya ba thams cad kyang rnam par dpyod do //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa dang / spyod yul gang yin pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgo rnam par dbye ba'i khyad par gang yin pa dang / ji ltar thob par bya ba thams cad kyang rnam par dpyod do //
translated: what is the natural outcome, what is the domain, what is the manifestation, what is the correct view, what is the distinction in the classification of Dharma doors, and how everything is to be attained.

original: de dag la shin tu rnam par dpyad pas chos thams cad la mi gnas shing /
analyzed: de dag la shin tu rnam par dpyad pas chos thams cad la mi gnas shing /
translated: Through this thorough analysis, they do not abide in any phenomena.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang dag par 'da'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang dag par 'da'o //
translated: By comprehending the nature of the mind, they transcend the bodhisattva levels.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
translated: Bodhisattvas

original: 'di ltar bdag cag gis ci nas kyang myur du 'da' bar bya'o; ;snyam du mi sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag cag gis ci nas kyang myur du 'da' bar bya'o; ;snyam du mi sems te /
translated: do not think, ‘We must quickly transcend this.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di ltar de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag cag sa nas sa la rnam par gnas pas /
analyzed: bdag cag sa nas sa la rnam par gnas pas /
translated: They think, ‘We must abide on the levels.

original: ji lta ji ltar yang dag par gnas @47b pa de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs ches che ba skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar yang dag par gnas @47b pa de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs ches che ba skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: The greater our abiding, the greater the accumulation of merit that will arise.’

original: ji lta ji ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji lta ji ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the more the great accumulation of merit grows, the more one approaches the level of the tathagatas and the more one is able to remain in the service of the buddhas through immeasurable buddha activities.

original: snyam ste / de dag sbyor ba rgyun ma chad cing /
analyzed: snyam ste / de dag sbyor ba rgyun ma chad cing /
translated: With this thought, they are constantly engaged in practice,

original: skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / tshogs kyi rgyan chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa las yang dag par 'da'o //
analyzed: skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang / tshogs kyi rgyan chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam par dgod pa las yang dag par 'da'o //
translated: and with an undaunted mind, they transcend the bodhisattva levels through the great adornment of the accumulations.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the conquerors!

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa bcus spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa bcus spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya ste /
translated: Bodhisattvas should purify the mandala of their conduct through ten aspects.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: yo byad yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bzod pa dang des pa mi zad pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba dang /
analyzed: yo byad yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / bzod pa dang des pa mi zad pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba dang /
translated: It is to be without attachment to possessions. It is to satisfy all beings. It is to be without fault in taking up the precepts. It is to be beyond exhaustion and to follow the level of patience and gentleness.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyi shugs rmongs pa med pa dang / gcig las rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang / gnas med pa'i spyod pa sgrub dka' ba thams cad la sems ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / dran pa'i stobs kyi shugs rmongs pa med pa dang / gcig las rnam pa tha dad pa'i chos kyi rjes su song zhing khong du chud pa dang / gnas med pa'i spyod pa sgrub dka' ba thams cad la sems ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang /
translated: It is to be endowed with the application of irreversible diligence. It is to be without delusion and to have the power of mindfulness. It is to follow and comprehend the Dharma that is different from one thing. It is to have a mind like the king of mountains with regard to all difficult practices.

original: sems can thams cad ma 'dres pa'i mu stegs su gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ma 'dres pa'i mu stegs su gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa ste /
translated: It is to be without a home. It is to be a non-Buddhist with regard to all beings. It is to be of the same continuum as all buddhas in all worlds.

original: kye rgyal @48a *//
analyzed: kye rgyal @48a *//
translated: “O King,

original: ba'i sras / rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba'i sras / rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: These are the ten aspects by which the bodhisattvas purify the domain of their practice.

original: de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa des rnam pa bcus shin tu dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ltar yongs su sbyangs pa des rnam pa bcus shin tu dag par 'gyur te /
translated: And their bodhisattva practice, thus purified, becomes very pure in ten ways.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: sems can gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pas yang dag par dgongs pa dang / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i grogs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pas yang dag par dgongs pa dang / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i grogs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa dang /
translated: They are: the bodhisattvas are considered by the chief beings in other world systems; they produce roots of virtue by the company of past bodhisattvas; they are skilled in maintaining the buddhas’ blessing;

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang dag par brten pa dang / mos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos tha dad pa thams cad la tha mi dad par rtogs pa dang / snying rje'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu che ba dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yang dag par brten pa dang / mos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bag yod pa la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos tha dad pa thams cad la tha mi dad par rtogs pa dang / snying rje'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu che ba dang /
translated: It is to rely upon a spiritual friend, to have interest, to be diligent, to be conscientious, to realize that all phenomena are undifferentiated, to have the great power of compassion,

original: chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / sbyor ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag ste /
translated: to accomplish the perfection of wisdom that sees all phenomena as they are, to apply the discernment of skill in means, and to follow the power of the thus-gone ones in all one’s activities.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of noble family!

original: rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should purify the domain of conduct through these ten aspects.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of noble family!

original: de la @48b byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par dag pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de la @48b byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par dag pa bcu ste /
translated: “What are the ten pure bodhisattva aspirations?

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: skyo ba med par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang / lus dang srog gis bsngo zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam dang /
analyzed: skyo ba med par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam dang / lus dang srog gis bsngo zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i smon lam dang /
translated: the aspiration to ripen the realms of sentient beings without becoming weary; the aspiration to purify the realms of the world by accumulating various roots of virtue; the aspiration to uphold the sublime Dharma by dedicating one’s body and life;

original: ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dpyad pa khong du chud pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis su med pas tshul gcig gi rgyud du 'gro ba'i smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo la 'jug pas chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i smon lam dang /
analyzed: ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dpyad pa khong du chud pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang gnyis su med pas tshul gcig gi rgyud du 'gro ba'i smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo la 'jug pas chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i smon lam dang /
translated: the aspiration to enter the buddha realms by comprehending the analysis of the gateway of wisdom; the aspiration to enter the stream of the single way by being nondual with all bodhisattvas; the aspiration to comprehend all phenomena by entering the gateway of the thus-gone ones;

original: mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas blta na don yod pa'i smon lam dang / phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas bskal par gnas pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i theg pa'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam par sbyangs pa'i smon lam dag ste /
analyzed: mos pa rnam par sbyangs pas blta na don yod pa'i smon lam dang / phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas bskal par gnas pa'i smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i theg pa'i rgyan rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas rnam par sbyangs pa'i smon lam dag ste /
translated: the aspiration to be seen as meaningful by purifying one's motivation, the aspiration to remain for an eon by blessing the far distant future, and the aspiration to purify the adornments of the vehicle of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra in every way.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the conquerors!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
translated: The bodhisattvas

original: de ltar smon lam rnam par sbyong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar smon lam rnam par sbyong ngo //
translated: purify their aspirations in this way.

original: de dag rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: de dag rnam pa bcus smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: They perfect their aspirations through ten aspects.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams @49a *//
analyzed: yongs su skyo ba med pa dang / rgya chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa rnams @49a *//
translated: They are the aspirations to be free of weariness, to accomplish the vast, to be born in the presence of the buddhas, to be born in the presence of the bodhisattvas, to be born in the presence of the spiritual masters, to be born in the presence of the pratyekabuddhas, to be born in the presence of the sravakas, to be born in the presence of the gods, to be born in the presence of the humans, and to be born in the presence of the animals.

original: kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thos nas rang gi smon lam du mngon par sgrub pa dang / bsam pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar gtugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thos nas rang gi smon lam du mngon par sgrub pa dang / bsam pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar gtugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa dang /
translated: the attainment of the treasure of the buddhas’ teachings,🔽the attainment of the treasure of the bodhisattvas’ practices,

original: bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas mi 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyis ci mi snyam pa dang / bde ba thams cad la ye mi rngam pa dang / bsam pa mnyam pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su srung ba dag ste /
analyzed: bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas mi 'jigs pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyis ci mi snyam pa dang / bde ba thams cad la ye mi rngam pa dang / bsam pa mnyam pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su srung ba dag ste /
translated: the attainment of the treasure of the bodhisattvas’ aspirations,🔽the attainment of the treasure of the buddhas’ qualities,🔽the attainment of the treasure of the buddhas’ miracles,🔽and the attainment of the treasure of the buddhas’ teachings.

original: de dag smon lam chen po de ltar yongs su sbyong zhing yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de dag smon lam chen po de ltar yongs su sbyong zhing yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: “Noble one, when bodhisattvas are engaged in purifying and perfecting those great aspirations, they attain the inexhaustible treasure of seeing the buddhas.

original: gzungs 'khrul pa med pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: gzungs 'khrul pa med pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of the dhāraṇī that is free from error.

original: smon lam zad mi shes pas chos thams cad shin tu rtogs pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: smon lam zad mi shes pas chos thams cad shin tu rtogs pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: Through inexhaustible aspirations, they attain the dhāraṇī that is the complete realization of all phenomena.

original: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of great compassion that protects all beings.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyud kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of the stream of samādhis.

original: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of merit that satisfies all beings.

original: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta @49b ba bzhin du brtag pa'i ye shes kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta @49b ba bzhin du brtag pa'i ye shes kyi gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of the wisdom that correctly analyzes all phenomena.

original: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of the accomplishment of the ripening of their actions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' yas pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' yas pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of the infinite blessings of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par gtogs pa la 'jug pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par gtogs pa la 'jug pa'i gter zad mi shes pa'ang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They also attain the inexhaustible treasure of entering the world systems without end or middle.

original: de ltar gter rab tu thob cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pas; sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter gyi sbyin pa byed do //
analyzed: de ltar gter rab tu thob cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa de dag ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pas; sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter gyi sbyin pa byed do //
translated: Thus, having attained the treasure and possessing the inexhaustible accumulations of merit and wisdom, they give the gift of the treasure of the Dharma to sentient beings with the pure maṇḍala of great wisdom, in accordance with their aspirations.

original: de la rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: de la rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: Noble sons of the Victorious Ones,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar 'jug ce na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ji ltar 'jug ce na /
translated: how do the bodhisattvas engage in accordance with the aspirations of sentient beings?

original: sbyor ba ji lta bur rgyu ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen ji lta ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba las sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba ji lta bur rgyu ba dang / rgyu dang rkyen ji lta ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba'i sbyor ba ji lta ba las sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste /
translated: They know the thoughts of beings according to their engagement in the various kinds of activities, according to the various causes and conditions, and according to the engagement of the mind and mental factors.🔽They know the thoughts of beings according to their engagement in such thoughts, and they teach the Dharma accordingly.

original: de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing chos yang dag par ston te; de dag 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir mi sdug pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: de dag de ltar bsam pa la zhugs pa rnams sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing chos yang dag par ston te; de dag 'dod chags kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir mi sdug pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn beings away from thoughts of desire, they teach repulsiveness.

original: zhe sdang gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba yang @50a *//🔽dag par ston to //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba yang @50a *// dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn beings away from thoughts of anger, they teach the practice of great love.

original: gti mug gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: gti mug gi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn beings away from thoughts of delusion, they teach skill in discerning phenomena.

original: cha mnyam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: cha mnyam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes kyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of equality, he teaches the Dharma door of the special wisdom.

original: 'khor ba'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of saṃsāra, he teaches the three sufferings.

original: gnas kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: gnas kyi bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i chos kyi sgo yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of a basis, he teaches the Dharma door of no basis.

original: zhum pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rgya chen po'i yul yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: zhum pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rgya chen po'i yul yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of discouragement, he teaches the domain of the vast.

original: bdag gi nga rgyal gyis bcom pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: bdag gi nga rgyal gyis bcom pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of being defeated by the pride of self, he teaches the equality of phenomena.

original: g-yo dang sgyus mi mnyam pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: g-yo dang sgyus mi mnyam pa'i bsam pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / zhi ba'i gnas kyi bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: In order to turn away from the idea of inequality through deceit and fraud, he teaches the accomplishment of the bodhisattva’s equality of mind and the peaceful state of mind.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: These are the four.🔽🔽

original: de ltar sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter yang dag par ston te /
analyzed: de ltar sems can rnams la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi gter yang dag par ston te /
translated: In this way, he teaches the treasure of the Dharma to sentient beings in accordance with their thoughts.

original: de yang don dbyer med pa yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: de yang don dbyer med pa yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the indivisible meaning.

original: yi ge'i mtshams 'byor bar sbyar bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: yi ge'i mtshams 'byor bar sbyar bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the connection of the letters.

original: shes pa rnam par dbye bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: shes pa rnam par dbye bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the classification of knowledge.

original: bstan pa snga phyi ma 'dres pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: bstan pa snga phyi ma 'dres pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the non-confusion of the earlier and later teachings.

original: @50b chos kyi tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i bye brag dbyer med pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: @50b chos kyi tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i bye brag dbyer med pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the indivisible distinction between the way and the non-way of the Dharma.

original: mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya rnam par mi 'khrug pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya rnam par mi 'khrug pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the unshakable seal of characteristics.

original: chos rab tu dgod pa rgyun chad pa med pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: chos rab tu dgod pa rgyun chad pa med pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the uninterrupted establishment of the Dharma.

original: mtha' yas pa sbyad  pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa sbyad  pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches the infinite.

original: the tshom thams cad shin tu gcad pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: the tshom thams cad shin tu gcad pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches in order to completely cut through all doubts.

original: dbang po'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: dbang po'i rgyud la 'jug pa'i phyir yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches in order to engage the continuum of the faculties.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la dgod par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la dgod par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by being dedicated to the seal of the Tathāgata.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mtshan nyid med pa rnam par mi 'khrug pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mtshan nyid med pa rnam par mi 'khrug pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by not disturbing the signless limit of reality.

original: chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by being dedicated to the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi rnga yang dag par brdung bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi rnga yang dag par brdung bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by beating the drum of the Dharma.

original: gnas thams cad yang dag par spangs pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: gnas thams cad yang dag par spangs pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by abandoning all abodes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mi gtong bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa mi gtong bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by not giving up the recollection of all tathāgatas.

original: tshig dang skad dang sgra dang ngag gi lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: tshig dang skad dang sgra dang ngag gi lam thams cad mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by not dwelling in the sameness of all words, sounds, voices, and verbal expressions.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: He teaches by following the realm of nonconceptuality.

original: dpe thams cad rnam par dgod pas rgyud dang mi 'gal bar brtan par bya bas yang dag par ston to //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang gi lus su sems pa la yang dag @51a *//🔽par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
analyzed: dpe thams cad rnam par dgod pas rgyud dang mi 'gal bar brtan par bya bas yang dag par ston to // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rang gi lus su sems pa la yang dag @51a *// par gzhol bas yang dag par ston to //
translated: It is taught by the complete arrangement of all examples, by being firm without contradicting the tantras.🔽It is taught by the complete engagement in the mind of the maṇḍala of the gnosis of all tathāgatas in one’s body.🔽It is taught by the complete engagement in the mind of the maṇḍala of the gnosis of all tathāgatas in one’s body.

original: de la'ang sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang / yo byad kyis yongs su bstud pa dang / sbyor ba mnyam par yongs su gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: de la'ang sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang / yo byad kyis yongs su bstud pa dang / sbyor ba mnyam par yongs su gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: Moreover, he purifies the perfection of generosity by satisfying all sentient beings, by providing them with all necessities, and by giving equally to all.

original: yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong ba dang / gnas med pa dang / nga rgyal med pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong ba dang / gnas med pa dang / nga rgyal med pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He purifies the perfection of morality by not abandoning his vow, by not dwelling on it, and by not being proud of it.

original: nyes pa thams cad khyad du gsod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / mthon dman med pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i sa mnyam par 'dzin pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad khyad du gsod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi 'khrugs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / mthon dman med pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i sa mnyam par 'dzin pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He purifies the perfection of patience by disregarding all faults, by not being disturbed by any sentient being, by being intent on sameness, by not being high or low, and by holding the inexhaustible earth as equal.

original: brtsam pa chen por rtsom pa dang / brtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa dang / sbyor ba phyir mi ldog pa dang / yid la byed pa phyir mi 'gyur ba dang / mthu mtha' yas pa dang / stobs la thub pa med pa dang /
analyzed: brtsam pa chen por rtsom pa dang / brtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa dang / sbyor ba phyir mi ldog pa dang / yid la byed pa phyir mi 'gyur ba dang / mthu mtha' yas pa dang / stobs la thub pa med pa dang /
translated: They are: to undertake great tasks, to be undaunted in all undertakings, to be irreversible in application, to be unchangeable in mental activity, to have infinite power, to be invincible in strength,

original: sngon du 'dor ba mi 'phrog pa dang / dad pa'i mthu chen po dang / blang @51b pa dang dor ba med pa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nyams pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: sngon du 'dor ba mi 'phrog pa dang / dad pa'i mthu chen po dang / blang @51b pa dang dor ba med pa'i tshogs thams cad yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgo nyams pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: to be unassailable in advance, to have the great power of faith, to expand all the accumulations without accepting or rejecting, and to be diligent in entering the undiminished door of omniscience. In this way, they perfect the transcendent perfection of diligence.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'du 'dzi yongs su sbyong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / rim gyis bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas med cing blang ba med pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu sel pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'du 'dzi yongs su sbyong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / rim gyis bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa dang / gnas med cing blang ba med pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu sel pa dang /
translated: It is to be inseparable from the purification of all the distractions of the qualities of the desire realm. It is to gradually accomplish the dhyānas and samādhis. It is to have a thorough realization that is without a basis and without grasping. It is to eliminate all the afflictions.

original: ting nge 'dzin sgo mtha' yas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rim gyis rnam par spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la rab tu 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig la sgo mtha' yas pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin sgo mtha' yas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rim gyis rnam par spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la rab tu 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gcig la sgo mtha' yas pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is to accomplish limitless samādhis. It is to follow the emanations of the great higher cognitions. It is to gradually enter the gateway of the samādhi of complete elimination. It is to enter the limitless gateways of a single samādhi.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul thams cad shes pa dang / de'i yul gyi rjes su rab tu zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ye shes kyi phyag rgya mi 'khrug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul thams cad shes pa dang / de'i yul gyi rjes su rab tu zhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ye shes kyi phyag rgya mi 'khrug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They purify the perfection of meditation by knowing all the objects of meditation, by engaging in their objects, and by approaching the level of omniscience, which is the seal of wisdom that is unshaken by all concentrations and meditative absorptions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / thos pa thams cad @52a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa dang / gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / thos pa thams cad @52a *//
translated: They purify the perfection of wisdom by never tiring of listening to all the teachings of the buddhas, of retaining them, of taking them up, of keeping them, of serving all spiritual friends, of listening to all the teachings,

original: kyis mi ngom pa dang / ji ltar thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtog pa dang / de la mngon sum du mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: kyis mi ngom pa dang / ji ltar thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtog pa dang / de la mngon sum du mnyam par gzhog pa dang / sgro 'dogs pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /
translated: being skilled in discerning all phenomena,🔽not differentiating the characteristics of phenomena,🔽meditating and fully meditating spontaneously through the door of the tathagatas,🔽engaging in the powers,

original: mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya tha mi dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo nas lhun gyis grub par sgom zhing rnam par sgom pa dang / stobs la 'jug pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya tha mi dad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo nas lhun gyis grub par sgom zhing rnam par sgom pa dang / stobs la 'jug pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
translated: continuously engaging in the wisdom of omniscience,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo kun dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgo kun dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'jug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: and engaging in the perfection of wisdom through the door of omniscience by means of the perfection of wisdom endowed with all doors.

original: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bsam pa bzhin du bya ba ston pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang /🔽'phags pa'i spyod pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa dang / sbyor ba thams cad shin tu brtags pas rgyu ba dang / rgyan thams cad bstan pa gnas med pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i rgyud thams cad ston pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / bsam pa bzhin du bya ba ston pa dang / bya ba thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i spyod pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar ston pa dang / sbyor ba thams cad shin tu brtags pas rgyu ba dang / rgyan thams cad bstan pa gnas med pa dang /
translated: They teach all the mundane activities of the world, and they are never discouraged by the need to ripen beings. They teach in accordance with the thoughts of beings, and they are not attached to any activities.🔽They teach childish behavior and noble behavior in accordance with the thoughts of beings, and they teach both saṃsāra and nirvāṇa. They move about having thoroughly examined all their activities, and they display all ornaments without being attached to them.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i spyod pas thabs la mkhas @52b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ngo //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i spyod pas thabs la mkhas @52b pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ngo //
translated: They follow and accompany all beings, and they purify the perfection of skill in means through the conduct of liberating all beings.

original: sems can gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar thug par mchod pa dang / chos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug par rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mthar thug par yongs su sbyang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar thug par mchod pa dang / chos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug par rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
translated: It is to bring sentient beings to full maturity, to purify all world systems, to make offerings to all thus-gone ones, to attain perfect awakening in the absence of attachment to the Dharma,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par rab tu gnas pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i mthar thug par stobs la 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba dang ldog pa mthar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par rab tu gnas pa dang / sems bskyed pa'i mthar thug par stobs la 'jug pa dang / 'gro ba dang ldog pa mthar thug par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
translated: to perfect the sphere of conduct that is the ultimate expanse of reality, to remain until the end of future kalpas, to engage in the powers until the end of the development of bodhicitta, and to attain perfect awakening until the end of coming and going.

original: zhing gi gnas kyi mthar thug par thams cad mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rab tu thob par bya bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: zhing gi gnas kyi mthar thug par thams cad mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rab tu thob par bya bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They purify the perfection of vows by seeing everything in the limit of the realm of beings and by attaining the limit of the transcendent Buddhas knowledge.

original: bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang du gyur cing thub pa med pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs skyo ba med pa dang / byams pa chen po'i stobs snyoms pa'i sbyor ba can dang /
analyzed: bsam pa'i stobs kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dbang du gyur cing thub pa med pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs skyo ba med pa dang / byams pa chen po'i stobs snyoms pa'i sbyor ba can dang /
translated: They purify the perfection of strength by means of the strength of will, which is uncorrupted; the strength of superior determination, which is invincible; the strength of great compassion, which is inexhaustible; the strength of great love, which is applied with equanimity;

original: gzungs kyi stobs don thams cad kyi sbyor ba la bsgribs pa med pa dang / spobs pa'i stobs 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs theg pa thams cad kyi rgyan byed pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs @53a *//
analyzed: gzungs kyi stobs don thams cad kyi sbyor ba la bsgribs pa med pa dang / spobs pa'i stobs 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs theg pa thams cad kyi rgyan byed pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs @53a *//
translated: the strength of retention, which is unobstructed in applying all meanings; the strength of eloquence, which satisfies all beings; the strength of the perfections, which is the ornament of all vehicles; the strength of vows, which is the basis of all the Buddhas activities;

original: gcad du mi rung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzin pas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: gcad du mi rung ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs tshad med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la mos pa dam pa'i stobs rab tu 'dzin pas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: They purify the perfection of power by means of the power of the superknowledges, which is not to be cut off, and by means of the power of the highest aspiration for the Buddha’s blessing.

original: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa khong du chud pa dang / zhe sdang gi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / gti mug gi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa rjes su shes pa dang / slob pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /
