original: skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par rtogs pa dang / sems dang bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: skad cig gcig gis sems can mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par rtogs pa dang / sems dang bsam pa mtha' yas pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
translated: In a single instant, they understand the conduct of infinite sentient beings, they know all their infinite minds and thoughts, they realize all phenomena just as they are, and they follow the strength of the thus-gone ones.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khong du chud pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do //🔽bam po nyi shu lnga pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo thams cad dang ldan pa khong du chud pas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par byed do // bam po nyi shu lnga pa /
translated: By mastering all the gateways of the realm of phenomena, they purify the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhing /
analyzed: de dag de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su sbyong zhing /
translated: As they thus purify the perfections,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi phyogs mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rgya chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa la gnas shing sems can gyi khams ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du @53b yang dag par sgrol lo //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi phyogs mi gtong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rgya chen po'i rgyan dang ldan pa la gnas shing sems can gyi khams ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du @53b yang dag par sgrol lo //
translated: They perfect the perfections, they do not abandon the other side, and they liberate the realm of sentient beings in accordance with their vows, abiding in the adornment of the vast vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag dge ba'i las shin tu bsags pa ston pas ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol lo //
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i las shin tu bsags pa ston pas ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol lo //
translated: By teaching the accumulation of extremely virtuous karma, they liberate sentient beings who are going to the lower realms.

original: brtsam pa chen po la gzud pas sems can gyi khams mi khom par 'gro ba sgrol lo //🔽lhag mthong nye bar bstabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo //
analyzed: brtsam pa chen po la gzud pas sems can gyi khams mi khom par 'gro ba sgrol lo // lhag mthong nye bar bstabs pas gzugs kyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo //
translated: By introducing them to the great undertakings, they liberate the realm of sentient beings who are going to the unfavorable states.🔽By providing insight, they liberate the realm of sentient beings who are dwelling in the form realm.

original: phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs pas gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgrol lo //
analyzed: phra ba'i ye shes nye bar bstabs pas gzugs med pa'i khams su skyes pa'i sems can rnams sgrol lo //
translated: By providing subtle wisdom, they liberate the sentient beings who are born in the formless realm.

original: zhi ba'i tshul nye bar bstabs pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo; ;stobs bcu'i rgyan chen po dang ldan pa bstabs pas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo //
analyzed: zhi ba'i tshul nye bar bstabs pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo; ;stobs bcu'i rgyan chen po dang ldan pa bstabs pas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sgrol lo //
translated: By offering the great adornment of the ten powers, he liberates the realms of beings who aspire to the Great Vehicle.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sngon las dang po pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe sems can g-yang sa chen po nas lhung ba rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te sgo sna tshogs nas gzud par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon las dang po pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe sems can g-yang sa chen po nas lhung ba rnam pa tha dad par gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te sgo sna tshogs nas gzud par bya'o //
translated: when he was on the beginner’s stage, he knew the different ways in which beings fall into the great abyss, and he led them to the various paths.

original: zhes sengge'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob pa rnams sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes sengge'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin du ye shes thob pa rnams sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, those who have attained wisdom are engaged in liberating all beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras //
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu la zhugs pa ni /
translated: Bodhisattvas who have entered such wisdom

original: rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te /🔽de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la @54a *//
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos kyi rigs dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin te / de dag byang chub kyi sems gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la @54a *//
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Buddha, the lineage of the Dharma, and the lineage of the Sangha.

original: gzhol bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: gzhol bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Buddha because they cause the mind of awakening to descend into the mindstreams of others.

original: chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grel pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: chos kyi mdzod rnam par 'grel pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Dharma because they open the treasury of the Dharma.

original: bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: bstan pa'i tshul dang 'gal bar mi byed pas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Sangha because they do not contradict the way of the teachings.

original: smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /🔽rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: smon lam chen po yang dag par brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul yang dag par ston pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Buddha because they utter the great aspirations.🔽They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Dharma because they teach the way of dependent origination.

original: snying po thob par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: snying po thob par byed pa'i chos la brtson pas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They are engaged in never interrupting the lineage of the Sangha because they strive in the Dharma that leads to the attainment of the essence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bon sems can gyi zhing la 'debs pas sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They do not cut off the family of the Buddha because they plant the seed of the Tathagata in the field of sentient beings.

original: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas chos kyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They do not cut off the family of the Dharma because they uphold the holy Dharma.

original: tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa la mi skyo bas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: tshogs chen po yongs su sdud pa la mi skyo bas dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They do not cut off the family of the Sangha because they are not discouraged about gathering the great assembly.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mi gtong pas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /🔽dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dran pa'i phyir rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mi gtong pas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa yin /
translated: They do not cut off the family of the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha because they never give up the instructions and teachings of the Tathagata in order to remember the deeds of the Buddhas, the Bhagavats of the past, present, and future.

original: de dag de ltar skyabs gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pas rtsom pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag de ltar skyabs gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pas rtsom pa thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa yin te /
translated: Because they are engaged in not cutting off the family of the Three Jewels in this way, all their undertakings are without fault.

original: brtsam pa gang ci rtsom yang rung /
analyzed: brtsam pa gang ci rtsom yang rung /
translated: Whatever they undertake,

original: de dag thams cad du thogs pa med @54b par thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag thams cad du thogs pa med @54b par thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgor 'byung ba thob bar byed do //
translated: They attain the ability to enter the door to omniscience without obstruction.

original: de dag de ltar lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa don yod par rtsom pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag de ltar lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa don yod par rtsom pa yin te /
translated: “They are engaged in the practice of roots of virtue that are not in vain, because they are engaged in the practice of the physical, verbal, and mental actions that are without fault.

original: sems can gyi don sbyor ba don yod par rtsom mo //
analyzed: sems can gyi don sbyor ba don yod par rtsom mo //
translated: They are engaged in the practice of the application of the benefit of sentient beings that is not in vain.

original: sems can don yod par 'dul bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can don yod par 'dul bar byed do //
translated: They are engaged in the practice of the training of sentient beings that is not in vain.🔽They are engaged in the practice of the teaching of the Dharma that is not in vain.

original: chos don yod par ston to; ;de'i chos bstan pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba la thogs pa med pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos don yod par ston to; ;de'i chos bstan pa thams cad kyang sems can gyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba la thogs pa med pas khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
translated: All their teachings of the Dharma are without obstruction in satisfying the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: de'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang log par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang log par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Not even a single thought of theirs is in vain.

original: sems bskyed pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gzhan thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su zin pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: All the other forms of bodhicitta, embraced by means of wisdom and skillful means, are dedicated to omniscience.

original: de de ltar chos dkar po bsags pa don yod pa de lta bu la gnas pas /
analyzed: de de ltar chos dkar po bsags pa don yod pa de lta bu la gnas pas /
translated: Thus, abiding in such a meaningful accumulation of virtuous qualities,

original: rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus sems bskyed pa thams cad yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: rgyan rnam par phye ba bcus sems bskyed pa thams cad yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: he dedicates all his forms of bodhicitta by means of ten kinds of analysis of ornaments.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar lus kyi rgyan sems can 'dul ba ji bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang / ngag gi rgyan the tshom thams cad gcod pa dang / sems kyi rgyan skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar lus kyi rgyan sems can 'dul ba ji bzhin du yang dag par ston pa dang / ngag gi rgyan the tshom thams cad gcod pa dang / sems kyi rgyan skad cig gcig gis ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
translated: They are as follows: the ornament of the body, which is to manifest in whatever way is necessary to guide sentient beings; the ornament of speech, which is to cut through all doubts; the ornament of mind, which is to realize meditative absorption in a single instant; the ornament of the buddhafield, which is to be free of defilements;

original: 'od kyi rgyan 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bkye bas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'khor gyi @55a *//
analyzed: 'od kyi rgyan 'od zer gyi dra ba mtha' dang dbus med pa bkye bas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'khor gyi @55a *//
translated: the ornament of light, which is to illuminate all beings by emanating a web of light rays that has no end or middle; the ornament of the retinue, which is to be surrounded by bodhisattvas who are equal in terms of their qualities;

original: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sems can gyi rnam pa tshad med pa'i tshogs yongs su mgu bar byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / bstan pa'i rgyan mkhas pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
translated: The ornament of the teaching is the retention of all learned people.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyan mngon par sangs rgyas pa gcig gis phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyan yul dang / dus dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dag ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyan mngon par sangs rgyas pa gcig gis phyogs bcu ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / chos byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyan yul dang / dus dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dag ste /
translated: The ornament of nirvāṇa is the filling of all the ten directions without exception by a single buddha. The ornament of the blessing of the Dharma is the teaching in accordance with the place, time, and vessel.

original: de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa thams cad du mngon par sgrub pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las don yod pa dang / ye shes chen po don yod pa rab tu 'thob ste /
analyzed: de dag rgyan de lta bus sems bskyed pa thams cad du mngon par sgrub pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las don yod pa dang / ye shes chen po don yod pa rab tu 'thob ste /
translated: With those ornaments, they attain the meaningful actions of body, speech, and mind and the meaningful great wisdom through accomplishing all the arousals of bodhicitta.

original: de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag mthong bas kyang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can rnams la don yod pa yin te /
translated: And even seeing them, they are meaningful to sentient beings because they ripen them for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: thos pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / rjes su rab tu byung ba dang / chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang pa dang / dad cing mos pa dang /
analyzed: thos pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang / rjes su rab tu byung ba dang / chos ston pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang pa dang / dad cing mos pa dang /
translated: Hearing, serving, associating, recollecting, following, going forth, teaching the Dharma, rejoicing in the roots of virtue, faith and interest,

original: chung ngu na ming brjod pa tsam yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin pa'i phyir sems can rnams @55b la don du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: chung ngu na ming brjod pa tsam yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin pa'i phyir sems can rnams @55b la don du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: and even just uttering the name, are meaningful to sentient beings because they ripen them for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious One!

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / rtsi'i ming mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lus la zhen pa'am /
analyzed: dper na / rtsi'i ming mthong na bde ba zhes bya ba de mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lus la zhen pa'am /
translated: For example, the mere sight of the name of a medicine called ‘Bliss’ immediately removes the attachment of sentient beings to their bodies,

original: ltor zos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ltor zos pa'i dug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The poison that has been ingested will be completely pacified.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of noble family!

original: de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dug thams cad byang bar 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, as soon as they see a bodhisattva who possesses such qualities, all the poisons of the afflictions of sentient beings are purified,

original: chos dkar po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos dkar po'i stobs kyi shugs kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the power of the strength of their wholesome qualities is born.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /🔽de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid de lta bu dang ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas te shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i 'khor thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas te ye shes dang /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid de lta bu dang ldan zhing chos de dag la gnas te shes rab kyi 'od chen pos ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i 'khor thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis pham par byas te ye shes dang /
translated: “O son of noble family!

original: bsod nams kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi stobs kyi shugs kyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas /
translated: In this way, a bodhisattva mahāsattva who possesses such qualities and abides by those qualities, having dispelled the darkness of ignorance with the great light of wisdom, having defeated the entire army of Māra with the power of great love and compassion, having overwhelmed all adversaries with the power of the strength of wisdom and merit, enters the vajra-like samādhi.

original: sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsal nas skyo ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu sgrub ste /🔽sngon chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par spyad pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas mngon par zhen pa @56a *//
analyzed: sems kyi dri ma thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad bsal nas skyo ba med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu sgrub ste / sngon chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par spyad pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog nas mngon par zhen pa @56a *//
translated: They clear away all the defilements of the mind and all the afflictions, and they accomplish all the abundant roots of virtue with the power and strength of being free from weariness.

original: med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te /
analyzed: med pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te /
translated: With the power and strength of having previously practiced in pure buddha realms, they turn away from all the paths of the lower realms and unfortunate destinies, and with the power and strength of being free from attachment, they purify the maṇḍala of wisdom.

original: rim gyis thabs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs nas chos dkar po thams cad kyi stobs dang /
analyzed: rim gyis thabs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang shugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs nas chos dkar po thams cad kyi stobs dang /
translated: Gradually, through the power and strength of method and wisdom, they accomplish the bodhisattva levels, the perfections, the concentrations, the superknowledges, the knowledges, and the fearlessnesses.

original: shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te /
analyzed: shugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub pa rab tu rgyas par byas te /
translated: Through the power and strength of all their virtuous qualities, they accomplish the pure ornaments of the body, speech, and mind of all the buddhas, their major and minor marks.

original: ye shes kyi shes par bya ba'i dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob cing /
analyzed: ye shes kyi shes par bya ba'i dbang dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob cing /
translated: Through the power of wisdom and the blessings of knowledge, they understand the equality of the powers of the thus-gone ones and all the unique qualities of the buddhas.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon lam gyi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul yang smon lam gyi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The domain of omniscient wisdom is also attained according to the specific aspirations.

original: sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan te /
analyzed: sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bstan te /
translated: Having attained manifest buddhahood through the blessings of the past and the blessings of wisdom, they reveal buddha realms according to the wishes of sentient beings.

original: 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor cing mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnam @56b par 'dul lo //
analyzed: 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor cing mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnam @56b par 'dul lo //
translated: They turn the great wheel of the Dharma for sentient beings according to their training and they tame infinite sentient beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos de lta bu dang ldan pa dag ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos de lta bu dang ldan pa dag ni /
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas who possess such qualities

original: tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te /
translated: attain the state of equality with all the buddhas through such a process.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing chos smra ba chen po'ang byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag tu dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing chos smra ba chen po'ang byed do //
translated: And having attained the bodhisattva way of life, they uphold the holy Dharma in infinite world systems and become great Dharma teachers.

original: de ltar chos smra ba byed pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi tshul rab
analyzed: de ltar chos smra ba byed pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag chos kyi mdzod chen po gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir tha dad pa yang dag par shes pas chos kyi tshul rab
translated: When they act as Dharma teachers, they are empowered by the tathagatas, the arhats, the fully enlightened buddhas. In order to uphold and protect the great Dharma treasury, they use the bodhisattva words that follow the analysis of the Dharma way with the analytical knowledges.

original: tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gi lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: tu dbye ba'i rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par bdag gi lus kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: They bless their bodies with ornaments in infinite circles of followers.

original: bstan pa mngon par sgrub pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i mkhas pa mtha' yas pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
analyzed: bstan pa mngon par sgrub pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i mkhas pa mtha' yas pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
translated: the accomplishment of the teachings endowed with all the supreme aspects, the skill in the knowledge of distinctions, the entrance into the inexhaustible door of wisdom, the blessing of the extremely differentiated circle of speech,

original: dbyangs gcig bsgrags pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / shes pa'i sa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / lus kyi byin gyi rlabs @57a *//
analyzed: dbyangs gcig bsgrags pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / shes pa'i sa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang / lus kyi byin gyi rlabs @57a *//
translated: the pure aspects of speech that please the entire circle of the retinue with the proclamation of a single melody, the following of the levels of knowledge, latent tendencies, and intentions just as they are, and the blessing of the body.

original: kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang / lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du phyin kyang zil gyis mi non pa dang / lus kyi rgyan sgo thams cad du rnam par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sems dang / bsam pa khong du chud pas rab tu rtogs pa dang /
translated: They are not outshone when they enter the middle of the assembly. They display their physical ornaments at all doors. They understand the minds and thoughts of the entire assembly.

original: tshig grol ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa dang / chos 'chad pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de /
analyzed: tshig grol ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa dang / chos 'chad pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pas chos kyi gtam chen po byed de /
translated: They teach through the blessing of liberated speech. They give great Dharma talks through their skill in the blessing of teaching the Dharma.

original: stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i dbang zhum pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / ye shes kyi dbang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa med pa dang /
analyzed: stobs dang shugs kyi dbang thub pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i dbang zhum pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / ye shes kyi dbang gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang chos kyi mtshan nyid 'khrugs pa med pa dang /
translated: They have the power of strength that cannot be overcome, the power of fearlessness that cannot be intimidated, the power of the Dharma that cannot be outshone, the power of wisdom that cannot be defeated, and the power of the perfection of wisdom that does not disturb the characteristics of phenomena.

original: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i dbang mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chad pa med par bsam pa shin tu rtogs pa dang / gzungs kyi dbang chos thams cad rnam par gdon mi za ba la 'jug pa dang / smon lam gyi dbang dpe sna tshogs kyis bstan pa'i tshul nye bar sgrub pa shin tu bstan pa dang /

analyzed: @57b de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos kyi gtam gsung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang smon lam gyi khyad par dang ldan pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na byang chub sems dpa' de la phyir brgal ba'am /
translated: Except for the bodhisattvas who have the special wisdom and aspirations, there are no beings in the realms of sentient beings who can challenge that bodhisattva,

original: spyi gtsug blta ba'am /
analyzed: spyi gtsug blta ba'am /
translated: look at the crown of his head,

original: zil gyis mnan pa'am /
analyzed: zil gyis mnan pa'am /
translated: overpower him,

original: dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med de /
analyzed: dri ba'i tshogs yongs su dri bas thub par bya bar nus pa'i sems can gang yang med de /
translated: or ask him questions in a way that would exhaust his answers.

original: de ni / gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni / gnas med do //
translated: That is impossible.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the conquerors!

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor zhig yod la /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' dbang de lta bu thob pa la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa tsam du yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor zhig yod la /
translated: If there were a circle of followers as vast as inexpressibly many world systems,

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum gyi bdag po'i gzi brjid thob pa sha stag gis gang ba zhig yin na yang de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tu lus bstan pa'i dbang gis zil gyis mnan
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de yang sems can stong gsum gyi bdag po'i gzi brjid thob pa sha stag gis gang ba zhig yin na yang de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ma thag tu lus bstan pa'i dbang gis zil gyis mnan
translated: As soon as they enter the assembly of bodhisattvas, they outshine the entire assembly with the power of their bodies.

original: te / byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gzhi tshim par byas nas ye shes chen po'i dbang gis sems dang bsam pa rnam par shes par byas te mi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston pa byed cing /
analyzed: te / byams pa chen po'i dbang gis lus kyi gzhi tshim par byas nas ye shes chen po'i dbang gis sems dang bsam pa rnam par shes par byas te mi 'jigs pa'i bsam pa chen pos chos ston pa byed cing /
translated: Through the power of great love, they satisfy the basis of the body. Through the power of great wisdom, they satisfy the mind and thoughts. Through the power of great fearlessness, they teach the Dharma.

original: spobs pa chen po'i dbang gis sems can tshim par byed do //
analyzed: spobs pa chen po'i dbang gis sems can tshim par byed do //
translated: Through the power of great eloquence, they satisfy beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: “O son of the victors!

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
translated: Because those bodhisattvas

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang @58a *//
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa dang @58a *//
translated: possess an immeasurable maṇḍala of wisdom,

original: ldan; chos rnam par 'byed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan /
analyzed: ldan; chos rnam par 'byed pa shin tu rnam par phye ba la mkhas pa dang ldan /
translated: are skilled in the discernment of phenomena,

original: dran pa'i stobs dang shugs ma nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan /
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs dang shugs ma nyams shing rgya che ba dang ldan /
translated: He had the undiminished power and strength of memory and was vast.

original: chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar bzung zhing blangs pas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par gdon mi za bar bzung zhing blangs pas rtogs par mkhas pa dang ldan /
translated: He was skilled in realization because he had taken up and held the way of all Dharmas without doubt.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa mtha' dbus med pa dang ldan /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa mtha' dbus med pa dang ldan /
translated: He had the skill in means of a Bodhisattva without end or middle.

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid bsgribs pa med pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang ldan /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid bsgribs pa med pa'i chos ston pa la mkhas pa dang ldan /
translated: He was skilled in teaching the Dharma without obscuration of the characteristics of the Dharma.

original: mos pa la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs pa dang ldan /
analyzed: mos pa la mkhas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis blangs pa dang ldan /
translated: He was skilled in devotion and had taken up the blessings of all Buddhas.

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa dang ldan /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa dang ldan /
translated: He was skilled in the blessings of wisdom that are completely focused on the maṇḍala of the Tathāgatas of the three times.

original: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i bsam pa bzang po rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos smra ba chen po byed cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i bsam pa bzang po rnam par dag pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos smra ba chen po byed cing /
translated: He is the foremost of all sentient beings, and he is the one who, in the past, the present, and the future, is the same continuum of the pure, good mind of the great Dharma teachers who are skilled in the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod kyang rnam par 'byed do //
translated: He is the one who opens the treasure of the Dharma of the Tathāgatas.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang / ye shes 'byams klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yid kyi smon lam dang / ye shes 'byams klas pas dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He is the one who upholds the holy Dharma through the bodhisattva’s mental aspirations and the infinite wisdom that is the blessing of the wisdom of the tathāgatas of the past, the future, and the present.”

original: de nas byang chub sems @58b dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems @58b dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so
translated: Then the bodhisattva Dharmeśvara, in order to teach the chapter on the gradual arising of the Dharma gate, through the blessing of the Buddha spoke these verses at that time:

original: // bsod nams tshogs bsags byang chub sems la gnas pa rnams //
analyzed: // bsod nams tshogs bsags byang chub sems la gnas pa rnams //
translated: Those who have accumulated the merit collection and abide in bodhicitta,

original: rtag tu bag yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dag /
analyzed: rtag tu bag yod blo brtan mthu chen bdog pa dag /
translated: Always heedful, with stable minds, possessing great power,

original: dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab mi gtong bas //
analyzed: dran dang ldan zhing byang chub sems rab mi gtong bas //
translated: Mindful, never abandoning the bodhicitta,

original: phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed //
analyzed: phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed //
translated: They please the Sugatas in the ten directions.

original: brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams pa dran ldan mos pa brtan pa can //
translated: Those who have begun striving, are mindful, have stable interest,

original: 'jig rten kun la rtag tu mi gnas mi ldog pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun la rtag tu mi gnas mi ldog pa //
translated: Never dwelling or turning back in the whole world,

original: zab pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan med pa'i tshul mkhas rnams //
analyzed: zab pa'i chos zhugs mya ngan med pa'i tshul mkhas rnams //
translated: Skilled in the way of the profound Dharma, free from sorrow,

original: phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed //
analyzed: phyogs rnams bcu por bde gshegs rnams ni mnyes par byed //
translated: They please the Sugatas in the ten directions.

original: brtson 'grus brtan pas bde gshegs mnyes par byas nas kyang //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtan pas bde gshegs mnyes par byas nas kyang //
translated: With stable diligence, they please the Sugatas,

original: dus gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: dus gsum bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes ldan pa rnams //
translated: And with the accumulations of merit and wisdom in the three times,

original: sa rnams gnod byed spyod mchog nyams pa med par byed //
analyzed: sa rnams gnod byed spyod mchog nyams pa med par byed //
translated: They make the stages of awakening free from harm and the best of practices.

original: thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa'ang de bzhin byed //
analyzed: thub pa'i smon lam rdzogs byed ston pa'ang de bzhin byed //
translated: They fulfill the Sage’s aspirations and act in the same way as the teachers.

original: ye shes gcig la zhugs pa de dag thob bya ba //
analyzed: ye shes gcig la zhugs pa de dag thob bya ba //
translated: They attain the state of being engaged in a single wisdom

original: thob nas 'gro ba kun la sbyin pa rab tu gtong //
analyzed: thob nas 'gro ba kun la sbyin pa rab tu gtong //
translated: And having attained it, they give it to all beings.

original: bsam pa dag dang khams dang sbyor ba shes byas nas //
analyzed: bsam pa dag dang khams dang sbyor ba shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood their intentions, dispositions, and practices,

original: dbang po ji bzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang ston //
analyzed: dbang po ji bzhin mkhas pa de ltar chos kyang ston //
translated: The wise teach the Dharma in accordance with their faculties.

original: pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: pha rol phyin la brtson pa mthu chen ldan pa rnams //
translated: Those who are diligent in the perfections and have great power

original: 'gro ba rnams la chos ston @59a *//
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams la chos ston @59a *//
translated: Teach the Dharma to beings

original: bdag gi don mi gtong //
analyzed: bdag gi don mi gtong //
translated: And do not abandon their own goals.

original: pha rol phyin rdzogs grol ba mthu chen ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: pha rol phyin rdzogs grol ba mthu chen ldan pa rnams //
translated: Those who are liberated through perfecting the perfections and have great power

original: khyu mchog mthu yis 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol //
analyzed: khyu mchog mthu yis 'khor ba'i mtsho las sems can sgrol //
translated: Liberate beings from the ocean of saṃsāra with the power of the supreme vehicle.

original: de ltar nyin mtshan skyo ba med par brtson byed cing //
analyzed: de ltar nyin mtshan skyo ba med par brtson byed cing //
translated: They practice day and night without weariness.

original: drang srong rgyal ba chos rigs mi gcod zhugs pa yis //
analyzed: drang srong rgyal ba chos rigs mi gcod zhugs pa yis //
translated: They are the heirs of the Victorious Ones, the sages, who are not cut off from the Dharma.

original: dkar po'i spyod pa gang yang rung ste spyod pa rnams //
analyzed: dkar po'i spyod pa gang yang rung ste spyod pa rnams //
translated: Whatever virtuous actions they perform

original: thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi sar 'gro'o //
analyzed: thams cad don yod rgyal ba rnams kyi sar 'gro'o //
translated: all lead to the stage of the victorious ones.

original: de dag ci spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang //
analyzed: de dag ci spyod thams cad 'gro ba rnams la yang //
translated: Whatever they do, it is for the sake of beings.

original: rnam smin don yod nyon mongs dri ma sbyong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam smin don yod nyon mongs dri ma sbyong bar 'gyur //
translated: Its fruition is never wasted, but purifies the stains of afflictions.

original: 'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsal byas shing //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i chos ldan de dag mun pa bsal byas shing //
translated: Those who possess such Dharma dispel darkness,

original: bdud 'khrug 'khor lo pham byas byang chub thob par byed //
analyzed: bdud 'khrug 'khor lo pham byas byang chub thob par byed //
translated: defeat the wheel of Mara, and attain enlightenment.

original: de ltar brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bde gshegs sras //
analyzed: de ltar brtson zhing ye shes thob pa'i bde gshegs sras //
translated: Thus, the heirs of the Sugatas, who are diligent and have attained wisdom,

original: bde gshegs rnams kyi chos rab mdzod kyang rab tu ston //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams kyi chos rab mdzod kyang rab tu ston //
translated: also reveal the treasury of the Dharma of the Sugatas.

original: de dag chos smra'i bya ba kun kyang shin tu byed //
analyzed: de dag chos smra'i bya ba kun kyang shin tu byed //
translated: They perform all the activities of Dharma teachers

original: bdud rtsi mchog zhim sprin gyi char yang mngon par 'bebs //
analyzed: bdud rtsi mchog zhim sprin gyi char yang mngon par 'bebs //
translated: and bring down a rain of the supreme nectar.

original: de dag snying rje byams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: de dag snying rje byams pas 'gro ba kun bkang zhing //
translated: They fill all beings with compassion and love.

original: brtan pa de rnams 'khor gyi bsam pa shes byas nas //
analyzed: brtan pa de rnams 'khor gyi bsam pa shes byas nas //
translated: Those steadfast ones, knowing the thoughts of the assembly,

original: gang gi bsam pa blo gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: gang gi bsam pa blo gros sems rgyud ci 'dra ba //
translated: Whatever their thoughts, their minds, and their dispositions,

original: de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos ni stong phrag du ma ston /
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos ni stong phrag du ma ston /
translated: In the same way, the Victor teaches the Dharma in many thousands of ways.

original: glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gros su 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: glang po'i stabs sdug tshul bzang 'gros su 'gro ba rnams //
translated: They walk with the beautiful gait of an elephant,

original: sengge'i rtsal ltar rtag tu sus kyang mi thub cing //
analyzed: sengge'i rtsal ltar rtag tu sus kyang mi thub cing //
translated: Always invincible like the power of a lion,

original: ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu ri rab bzhin gnas pa //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho lta bu ri rab bzhin gnas pa //
translated: Abiding like a wisdom ocean or Mount Meru,

original: sprin ltar @59b 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed //
analyzed: sprin ltar @59b 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs zhi bar byed //
translated: Like a cloud, they pacify the afflictions of all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad ces smras pa dang / de la ston pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis de skad ces smras pa dang / de la ston pas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do //
translated: When the bodhisattva Dharmamati said this, the teacher rejoiced.

original: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: Sutra of the Great Collection

original: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las /
translated: Buddhavatamsaka-sutra

original: chos snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos snang ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Chapter on the Illumination of the Dharma

original: nyi shu gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: nyi shu gsum pa'o ////
translated: Twenty-third

original: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad na gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs par snang ngo //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / gzhung de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar thams cad na gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling bzhi pa re re na de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bzhugs par snang ngo //
translated: Then, by the power of the Buddha, in all the world systems of the east, in all the world systems of the south, and similarly, in all the world systems of the zenith, in each of the four-continent world systems, many Tathāgatas appear.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to //
translated: And those Bodhisattvas, by the empowerment of the Tathāgatas, teach the Dharma.

original: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to //
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to //
translated: And I, by the empowerment of the Tathāgatas, teach the Dharma.

original: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par shes so //
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na 'khod par shes so //
translated: And I know that I am in the presence of the Tathāgatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshig ma btang bar byang chub kyi shing drung yang ma spangs par ri rab kyi rtse mo nas mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na ba der gshegs
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma bshig ma btang bar byang chub kyi shing drung yang ma spangs par ri rab kyi rtse mo nas mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i bu rab mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs gang na ba der gshegs
translated: Without destroying or relinquishing the Buddha’s miraculous concentration, without leaving the foot of the tree of enlightenment, the Buddha went from the peak of Mount Meru to the abode of the gods of the Heaven of the Supreme Assembly, to the palace of the god Supreme of the Supreme Assembly, wherever it was.

original: par snang ngo //🔽ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na @60a *//
analyzed: par snang ngo // ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na @60a *//
translated: He was seen there.

original: yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste /
analyzed: yang rab mtshe ma'i gnas su gshegs par snang ste /
translated: Just as the Buddha was seen going to the abode of the Supreme of the Supreme Assembly in this world of four continents, so he was seen going to the abode of the Supreme of the Supreme Assembly in all the worlds in the ten directions.

original: byin gyi rlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin ma 'khrugs par snang ngo //
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs snga ma rnams kyang de bzhin ma 'khrugs par snang ngo //
translated: And yet, the previous miracles were not disturbed.

original: de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang pa nor bu sna tshogs logs su mngon par gshegs pa mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgrubs🔽pa'i sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can /
analyzed: de nas lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas khang pa nor bu sna tshogs logs su mngon par gshegs pa mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgrubs pa'i sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can /
translated: Then the king of the gods Suyāma saw from afar the Blessed One approaching the palace of various jewels and, with a swift form, he magically created in the palace of various jewels a lion throne with a lotus center

original: lha rdzas kyi rin po che las byas pa /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rin po che las byas pa /
translated: made of divine jewels,

original: bog re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas brgyan pa /
analyzed: bog re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with a hundred thousand canopies,

original: gser gyi dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon par bres pa /🔽me tog gi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa /
analyzed: gser gyi dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas mngon par bres pa / me tog gi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu khyab par byas pa /
translated: covered with a hundred thousand golden nets,🔽filled with a hundred thousand flower canopies,🔽strung with a hundred thousand garland canopies,

original: phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu brgyus pa; spos kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun tu 'thul bar bdug pa /
analyzed: phreng ba'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu brgyus pa; spos kyi bla re brgya stong phrag bcus spos thams cad kun tu 'thul bar bdug pa /
translated: and perfumed with a hundred thousand incense canopies that emitted all fragrances.

original: rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu bres pa /
translated: It was covered with a hundred thousand jeweled canopies.

original: me tog gi gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba /🔽phreng ba'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba /
analyzed: me tog gi gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba / phreng ba'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bzung ba /
translated: It was held aloft by a hundred thousand flower parasols.🔽It was held aloft by a hundred thousand garland parasols.

original: rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bzung ba /
translated: It was held aloft by a hundred thousand jeweled parasols.

original: 'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus snang bar byas pa /🔽rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa /
analyzed: 'od zer brgya stong phrag bcus snang bar byas pa / rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa /
translated: It was illuminated by a hundred thousand light rays.🔽It was bowed to by a hundred thousand kings of the Heaven of the Yāma Gods.

original: tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba /
analyzed: tshangs pa brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par phyag bya ba /
translated: It was venerated by a hundred thousand Brahmās.

original: byang chub sems @60b dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa /🔽rol mo brdung ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems @60b dpa' brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa / rol mo brdung ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba /
translated: It was praised by a hundred thousand bodhisattvas.🔽It was accompanied by the sounds of a hundred thousand musical instruments being played.

original: chos kyi glu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos kyi glu'i dbyangs brgya stong phrag bcu'i glu'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
translated: It was accompanied by the songs of a hundred thousand celestial songbirds.

original: me tog gi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa /
analyzed: me tog gi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa /
translated: It was rained upon by a hundred thousand clouds of flowers.

original: phreng ba'i sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa /🔽rgyan gyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa /
analyzed: phreng ba'i sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa / rgyan gyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pa /
translated: a rain of clouds of garlands in the hundreds of thousands fell,🔽a rain of clouds of ornaments in the hundreds of thousands fell,

original: gos kyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pas kun nas yog pa /
analyzed: gos kyi sprin gyi char brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu phab pas kun nas yog pa /
translated: a rain of clouds of clothing in the hundreds of thousands fell,

original: nor bu rin po che'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char rab tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char rab tu phab pas kun tu snang bar byas pa /
translated: and it was illuminated by a rain of clouds of jewels in the hundreds of thousands.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas byung ba /
translated: It was produced by a hundred thousand roots of merit,

original: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: blessed by a hundred thousand buddhas,

original: bsod nams brgya stong phrag bcus bsags shing bsgrubs pa /🔽lhag pa'i bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu sbyangs pa /
analyzed: bsod nams brgya stong phrag bcus bsags shing bsgrubs pa / lhag pa'i bsam pa brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu sbyangs pa /
translated: accumulated and accomplished by a hundred thousand merits,🔽purified by a hundred thousand superior intentions,

original: smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par byas pa /
analyzed: smon lam brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par byas pa /
translated: purified by a hundred thousand aspirations,

original: spyod pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bslab pa /
analyzed: spyod pa brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bslab pa /
translated: trained in by a hundred thousand practices,

original: chos brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu brtan pa /
analyzed: chos brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu brtan pa /
translated: and stabilized by a hundred thousand Dharmas.

original: rnam par 'phrul ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa /🔽yon tan brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa / yon tan brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: He was endowed with ten hundred thousand emanations.🔽He was exalted by ten hundred thousand qualities.

original: brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brjod pa bshams so //🔽ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal por mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan gting ba @61a *//
analyzed: brjod pa brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brjod pa bshams so // ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'dir rab mtshe ma'i gnas kyi lha'i rgyal por mtshe ma'i khang pa nor bu sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan gting ba @61a *//
translated: He was arrayed with ten hundred thousand expressions.🔽Just as in this four-continent world system, in the abode of the Yāma gods, the king of the Yāma gods in the palace of various jewels prepared a seat for the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag gi rab mtshe ma'i gnas su yang khang ba nor bu sna tshogs su lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan rgyan 'di 'dra ba dang / bsham pa'i tshul 'di 'dra ba dag kyang bting bar gyur to //
